So you chose the best Final Fantasy ever.
The first girl you can choose is the cute, gorgeous, kind and wonderful Tifa Lockhart. Will Tifa be the giantess?

1111.title: Story...type....

11111.content: Now you´ll have to decide which story you want to follow: my rather strange storyline or someone else´s.
11111.title: A strange story?

choices: during Tifa´s childhood, after Cloud left Nibelheim
after the events of Advent Children
111111.content:
Hello. I´m sith. You´re wondering why I´m right here, talking to you, right? Well I want to tell you a story. A strange story, full of dangers, fun and excitement. It´s the story of my tiny adventures with my giantess girlfriend Tifa Lockhart, the most wonderful woman I know. Tiny adventures? Giantess Tifa? That sounds indeed strange, right? You might be asking if I´m still so tiny or if it was just an accident, but don´t worry, you´ll find out soon enough. Just listen to my story.
Everything began...
111111.title: My tiny adventures with my giantess girlfriend Tif

choices: I went to Tifa´s desk and got her attention
1111111.content:
(You can consider this story to be a prequel to the other Tifa-GTS story)
Years ago, when I was still a teenager, me and my twinbrother went to Nibelheim, after something terrible happened to our hometown (I don´t wanna talk about that). My brother was a great man; and he was the only person I could trust (until I met a certain girl...you know who I´m talking about). We both were capable of incredible fighting-abilities, although I didn´t look like someone who could pull this off.
Anyway, Tifa and I became friends shortly after we met, and even more importantly, her father accepted me as her, well, boyfriend.
Well, and now for my shrinkage. It was when I was practicing outside Nibelheim (shortly after my brother left Nibelheim for a journey), when a strange person appeared.
"Who are you?" I asked.
"He, he. So you are Sith, eh? I heard much about you." a female voice said.
"WHO ARE YOU?!"
"That´s of no importance. I just want to test you."
Then, the woman pointed with her arm at me and spoke some magical words. After that, she disappeared.
"What a strange woman." I whispered.
I now returned to the village, as I had to go to shool (hey, I was just a teenager back then!). But, unfortunately, something completely unexpected (really?) happened. When I was about to enter the classroom, I shrunk! I shrunk down to 1 inch tall! Although being upset about that, I had to do something. Fortunately, I saw Tifa´s desk right before me.
1111111.title: Shrinking in the Nibelheim classroom

choices: put me into her mouth! (not to eat me, but accidents happen...)
11111111.content:
I saw that gigantic cute girl, sitting at an equally gigantic desk. One thing was for sure: I had to do a lot of climbing.
"Great, really." I whispered. But then, I realized that I could use my abilities to get on that stupid desk. I simply used two table legs and force jumped from one to another, until I reached the top of the desk. The top of the desk was like a huge field, and directly in front of me, there was that incredibly beautiful girl, Tifa. I had to get her attention somehow, and I started to yell at her. But that wasn´t necessary, as she immediately saw me.
"Sith?! What are you doing here?! And why are you-"
"Calm down, Tifa! Don´t speak too loud, I don´t want anyone else to see me."
From now on, Tifa spoke more quietly.
"Sith, what happened?" she whispered.
"As you can see, I shrunk down to an extremly small size. I have no idea how and why, though."
"And why did you come to me?"
"Because you´re the only one here I can trust, Tifa."
I didn´t know for sure, but Tifa seemed to get red in her face for a moment.
"Thank you, Sith. But what are we gonna do know?"
"I don´t know. But as I said, I don´t want anyone to see me except for you. Do you think you could help me hide during the lesson?"
"Of course, Sith! Don´t worry, I´ll help you!"
Just then, the teacher was coming near Tifa´s desk. As I didn´t want to be seen, Tifa...
11111111.title: Pupil Tifa

choices: Tifa accidentally swallowed me! How unusual ;) !
111111111.content:
"Uh-oh, the teacher´s coming."
"What are you gonna do, Tifa?"
She seemed to be a bit upset about the situation, and she then grabbed me and put me...into her mouth! She did it so quickly that I didn´t even realize it immediately. And now, I was sitting inside a huge cave, white, teeth around me and the uvula and her threatening throat in front of me. I sat directly on her wet tongue, and I was covered in salvia immediately.
"I´m sorry, Sith, but I couldn´t think of something else." Tifa whispered.
"And, don´t worry, I won´t swallow you, ok? At least I´ll try."
"Of course you won´t swallow me. You´re my friend, right, Tifa?"
"Right!"
On the outside, the teacher passed Tifa´s desk and talked to her.
"Ah, Miss Tifa Lockhart, I already corrected your testpaper, and it was magnificent as always! You´re our number one student, next to Sith. That reminds me...Sith isn´t here today, I suppose?"
She wasn´t able to react, as she was afraid of accidentally swallowing me. She didn´t even move her head. It might have been quite an unusual situation, being inside my girlfriends huge mouth, but hey, it was Tifa´s mouth, and it wasn´t that bad. And it was good to hear that the teacher appreciated my good marks, and Tifa´s as well. Anyway, I was sitting on her tongue, just when...
111111111.title: Inside Tifa´s mouth

choices: She lies down to let Sith out
1111111111.content:
There was a large well... what sounded like an explosion. Which unfortuantely, well depending who you are, cause Tifa to swallow Sith on accident.(Yes quite unusual.)

"Ryu!" teacher said leaving Tifa and going to the back of the classroom. Sith found himself fall through the fleshy pit. And landed in the stomach with a splash.

"Huh. The acids aren't doing anything. Strange... but never mind that I have to tell Tifa that I'm alright." he thought. Sith got into a meditating stance. And set a mind link. His name is Sith after all. Heheheh.

"Tifa. Can you hear me?"

"Sith. Are you alright?!" she said full of concern.

"Yesyes. I'm fine. The acids aren't doing anything. But what the heck happened?"

"Well. The teacher is talking to the new student from Corel. You probably won't believe this but there's a hole in the wall now."

"What!? How?" Sith said confused.

"I don't have the slightest clue. But the teacher is whispering to him. There something that doesn't feel right." Tifa said.

"Students. You may all leave. We'll discuss what happened tomarrow." he said.

"Tifa. I think we should follow him. He seems well... alone. We should meet him." Sith said.

"Okay then." she said. After following him. He entered a house.

"I guess this is where he lives." Tifa said. She walked up to the house and knocked. She heard a voice saying "Wonder who that can be?" The door opened. And there stood the new guy known as Ryu.

"You're that one girl from class. Um... Tifa! Isn't it?" he said. "What are you doing anyway?"

"Well... we just decided to drop by." Tifa said.

"We? I don't see anybody else with you." he said confused.

"I mean I." she said quickly. Ryu nodded. Then offered Tifa to come in. Tifa accepted.

"Do you live here by yourself?" Tifa said. Ryu sat on the bed.

"Yeah. I don't have a family. No mother. No father. No sibilings as far as I know. It can get lonly sometimes." he said lying down. Then he quickly sat up. "You do have someone with you. I can sense their fighting spirit."

"He's joking. He has to be." Sith said to Tifa.

"Let me guess. Who ever this person is they shrunk." he said. Tifa and Sith were taken aback. "I knew it! That darn old hag is at it again."

"Ryu. Who is this person?" Sith said through a mind link.

"Telekinesis. Nice power. An old woman I knew from Corel. But she can make herself appear younger. She's been known to do this kind of thing. This is the last time she'll ever go back on word!" Ryu said clenching a fist.

"Can she reverse the spell?" Tifa asked. Ryu looked at her.

"To tell you the truth... I'm not so sure." he said trying not to look eye to eye. "Oh yeah. You might want to let out whoever you have inside you." he said with a face with slight disgust.
1111111111.title: Meeting Ryu

11111111111.content: tifa lay down on the bed and sith tried 3 times to get out and he got out
11111111111.title: She lies down to let Sith out

1111112.content:
After Sephiroth ceased to be a thread forever, Tifa returned to her hometown of Nibelheim. Although her life was now normal again. But something was missing: someone who would take care of her, a boyfriend, someone she loves from the bottom of her heart. She realized that Cloud never loved her as Aerith was still in his heart, so she was afraid that she´d never meet her prince she always dreamed of.
That´s when I came into the story. One day, I came to Nibelheim. In fact, I, too, returned to Nibelheim. I once lived there just like Tifa, and we became friends. But I didn´t see her since the destruction of Nibelheim. So you can imagine how glad we both were when we saw each other again. She put her arms around me and almost cried.
After that, we decided to live together, and everything was great, until the "shrink-day". It started with that materia we found on Mt. Nibelheim...
1111112.title: Dear friends

11111121.content:
Tifa and I were on Mt. Nibel to look for some materia. We searched for hours until Tifa spotted a strange looking materia. It was light brown and unusually small. I picked up the materia and looked at it more closely....
As soon as I touched the materia, I felt dizzy and numb. I staggered off the path and almost fell 1,000 feet when Tifa grabbed me to save me.
"What happened?" asked Tifa.
"I don't know" I said. "I just felt dizzy all of a sudden"
"Hey...aren't you smaller?" asked Tifa. I looked over at her. I was looking directly at her breasts. I WAS smaller and getting smaller by the second. I stopped shrinking when I was...
11111121.title: Shrinking Materia

choices: Both return to Tifa´s house in Nibelheim
111111212.content:
"You...you´re right. I AM smaller."
I looked on Tifa, and she was HUGE, incredibly huge. It reminded me of some fairy tales with giantesses, and I never expected to meet I a giantess in person. In fact, I didn´t expect the giantess to be the woman I love so much.
"According to your height, I must be about...1 inch tall."
"1 inch?! Oh...my...god!"
I now saw Tifa´s gigantic hand coming nearer. She carefully grabbed me, and after a few seconds I was standing on her hand, right in front of her huge face. And I was amazed. Of course I always knew how stunningly gorgeous Tifa is, but during that moment, I could see her beauty even more. Her pale face is nearly perfect. No. It IS perfect. Her soft skin, her beautiful lips, her kind and warm eyes, her long black hair...everything´s perfect. But I was amazed about the fact that Tifa is a natural beauty. Tifa doesn´t use things like make up or nail polish, and her outfit is not...well, explicit. She´s wearing a normal outfit, like most other girls. Anyway, I now had to talk with Tifa about that unusual situation.
"What are we gonna do now, Tifa?"
"I have no idea. We have to find something that returns you to your normal height. Maybe another materia."
"But that could take weeks, months or even years! And...where am I going to live in the meantime?"
Tifa smiled with a kind and caring expression, and she answered with her angel-like voice.
"You gonna live with me. And I will help you with your search for a cure."
"!!Tifa, are you sure?! I mean, living with a 1 inch man won´t be easy."
"I know. But we´re friends, aren´t we? And friends help each other. You...helped me in the past several times, and I´m really thankful. So, now it´s my turn. And...I really like you."
I was overwhelmed. Yes, Tifa is really a dear friend. I can count on her. And as long as I breathe, she can count on me, too.
111111212.title: Tifa and Sith

1111112121.content:
Tifa held me in her hand as she went back to Nibelheim. She was very careful not to drop me, which I was thankful. Even a fall from 5 feet might kill me! It WOULD'VE killed me! Tifa made it back to Nibelheim and walked to her house. She entered the house and set me down on the kitchen table. The materia that had shrunk me was still in my hands...it had shrunk with me. I wonder why it had. Did this mean that this materia could change me back to my normal height? I pointed this out to Tifa.
"Maybe" said Tifa. "some materia does have a reverse spell"
Tifa's stomach growled, a noise that seemed louder since I was one inch tall.
"All that climbing around has made me hungry" said Tifa. "I'll fix lunch"
1111112121.title: Lunch with Tifa

11111121211.content:
"Yeah, lunch sounds like a good idea. Especially when you´ll make it!"
"He, he, thanks, Sith!"
We both began to laugh, yet her laughter seemed to be louder than usual, which was no surprise since she was a giantess compared to me.
"Ok, Sith, what do you want to eat?"
"I don´t know. You decide, ok? No matter what you choose, it must be good! But...according to my height, I don´t think I´ll be able to eat that much, y´know?"
"Oh, yeah, I see. I´ll think of something?"
For a moment I forgot about everything around me and began to think about the materia again. Why on earth did it shrink me? I started to believe that there was a purpose for that. I didn´t know why and why it was me, but the fact that I shrunk didn´t seem to be an accident. But I would know. Soon enough. And as long as Tifa was with me, everything would be alright.
(a short note for the next chapters: TIFA IS NOT AN EVIL GIANTESS! She´s a kind girl, ok?)
11111121211.title: Lunch and thoughts about the materia

111111212111.content:
Tifa was looking through the kitchen, wondering what to cook. I knew that Tifa was a good cook. I also knew that she had a bar called '7th Heaven' in Midgar somewhere, but it was destoryed by those evil people at Shrina, Inc. I didn't know where in Midgar it was since I never been there. I like the small-town life better. After coming back to Nibelheim, Tifa argeed with me that small-town life was better.
"I'll just make some sandwhiches" said Tifa.
"Ok" I said.
"I just know there's a way to return you to normal size" said Tifa.
"And what if there's no way?" I asked.
"Don't talk like that" said Tifa. "there's always a reverse spell with these things"
I didn't say anything, but thought about my fate. Would I be like this forever? How could I survive being 1 inch tall? Tifa would look after me, but I still can't help but worry. Just a stomp from someone's shoes and I'll be a goner. Not that Tifa would do such a thing. She's not a murderer.
111111212111.title: what to cook?

choices: Tifa accidentally swallows me, completely unaware of it
Nothing special happens, just a normal lunch
1111112121111.content:
I watched Tifa making the sandwiches. I couldn´t help but smiling. She´s just too gorgeous. Even when she´s cooking. But no matter how hard I tried, I couldn´t forget about my fate. There might be a reverse spell, yes. And what if not? Surviving a life as a 1 inch tall man was not impossible (thanks to my..."special" abilities), but I was concerned where I could live. Together with Tifa? Yes, it sounded like heaven, but...would she be able to handle it? Always being careful with me and caring for me?
"Tifa..."
"Huh? What is it?"
"I...may I ask you something?"
"Sure."
"What if there´s really no reverse spell? What if there´s no way to turn me back? Where should I live? How should I live?"
Tifa looked at me with an expression of concern, then she grabbed me and put me on her right hand.
"I already told you. Whatever happens, you´ll stay with me. I will always care for you, you understand? I won´t let any harm come to you. I know, it might not be easy, but at least I´m together with you. Ok?"
"Tifa, I...Thank you. Thank you so much!"
She smiled.
"Anyway, I´m sure you´ll turn back to normal, so we´ll be living together the way it was."
She put me back on the kitchen table and continued with preparing the sandwiches. Again, Tifa proved how kind she is. A true friend. And the first woman who didn´t care about my look. I am not a muscle-man, you know, I´m just an ordinary guy, and guys like me normally don´t get girls like Tifa. But she´s different. She´s not arrogant, she´s kind, innocent and yet not a helpless girl. In fact, she´s the best fighter I´ve ever seen!
Once again, I thought about the dangers of my height: being crushed or maybe even...being eaten alive! I shuddered about that thought, when Tifa yelled: "Sith, lunch´s ready!"
She put me on the same plate as the sandwiches.
"Ok, I made 4 sandwiches. 3 for me, and one for you. Of course you won´t be able to eat it whole, according to your height. But hey, then I can eat what´s left, huh?"
She´s giggling, and I had to smile too. Although being so gorgeous, she always loved good food.
1111112121111.title: Lunch begins

choices: Tifa finishes the sandwhich and realizes her mistake
Tifa finishes the sandwhich and looks for Sith in the room
11111121211111.content:
Tifa was right. I could never eat my sandwhich in one sitting. If I had two weeks to eat it, I might be half-way through it. Tifa ate her 3 sandwhiches quickly.
"I'm quite hungry" said Tifa. "Mind if I finish off your sandwhich, Sith?"
I shook my head no. That was before I noticed a fly on the sandwhich. The fly looked like one of those countless monsters that Tifa had fought on her journey with Cloud (she had told me all about it when she came back to Nibelheim) and the others. I got on the sandwhich to shoo the fly away, when Tifa picked up the sandwhich! The fly flew away at once, but I was half-way to Tifa's mouth! I shouted, trying to get her attention, but it was hopeless. The sandwhich entered her mouth and started to chew the sandwhich. Her teeth ripped right through the bread and nearly chewed me to bits. I managed to avoid those giant white teeth, but..
"GULP"
Tifa swallowed me and the chewed up sandwhich! So this was my fate! Being swallowed alive by my best friend! I fell down her throat, being pushed down by the muscles of the throat. I was forced through a tiny opening and into a large chamber; Tifa's stomach! I landed with a soft thud. I closed my eyes. After a minute, I realized that I was still alive. But how? I was surrounded by stomach acid--which was doing its job of the chewed bits of sandwhich--but didn't appear to be effecting me! It was totally dark in Tifa's stomach. I could tell that she was still eating the sandwhich. I could hear her heartbeat, it was somehow comforting to me. Tifa would finish the sandwhich and realize that I wasn't with her anymore--well, I AM with her now, but you get the point.
11111121211111.title: Tifa's stomach

choices: ...I revealed my lightsaber! Hey, I´m called SITH, y´know!
111111212111112.content:
"Wow, that was good! Really tasty, don´t you think so, Sith?"
Silence.
"Sith, where are you?"
Tifa was really concerned in that moment (I could hear that from my position), as she promised to protect me. I could feel how she began to walk through the room, searching for me.
"Sith, that´s not funny! But, maybe he left for his room? Maybe he wants to be alone for a while? If that´s the case, then I won´t disturb him."
Inside my girlfriend´s body, I began to think about this unusual situation. It was indeed scary, but her heartbeat reminded me of the fact that I was inside Tifa, so it was a bit relieving. And the acids couldn´t hurt me, for a special reason. Because of the materia? Or something else? Maybe I´ll tell you later. And now, the darkness began to vanish (why? I´ll tell you later!), and I looked around. It was disgusting, and yet, the fact that it was Tifa´s inside made it beautiful. The pulsating pink stomach walls had a calming effect on me.
But now, something happened. So I could show why I´m called Sith: I saw a parasite inside Tifa´s stomach! It was disgusting, and I wanted to get rid off that thing, for Tifa´s sake. And such a huge, awful bug like thing would disturb my thoughts about how to get out of Tifa. So...
111111212111112.title: Being within my beloved girlfriend

choices: get ready for parasite-slashing lightsaber action!
1111112121111121.content: Before you move along, remember: I´m not evil, ok? I´m like Tifa: kind and caring. The fact that I´m called Sith doesn´t mean I´m Darth Maul or Darth Sidious-like!! So, now move along! Get ready for the most "unusual" (or ridiculous?) "Final Fantasy VII-Tifa-giantess-mild vore-story" of all time!
1111112121111121.title: Attention!

11111121211111211.content:
I rushed to the parasite, whipping out my lightsaber and turned it on. Walking in a stomach isn't the easiest thing to do; it's slippery and slimy. Somehow, I made it over to the parasite without slipping.

"Die you vermin!" I yelled and whacked at the parasite. It split down in two, very much dead. I kicked the remains in a pool of stomach acid, which quickly went to work on the dead parasite. I looked around to see if there were more parasites inside my beloved Tifa. There didn't seem to be any more.

Outside, Tifa was out of her mind with worry. She figured I'll be in my room, but I wasn't there! I wish I could've told Tifa where I was, but didn't want to hurt her for her to notice me inside of her. Anyway, I was getting used to it in here. But I didn't want to spend the rest of my life in my girlfriend's belly! I had to get out somehow. I could easily go down her intestines, but I wasn't really sure I wanted to explore more of Tifa's innards. However, I didn't have much choice. There was no way I could go out the same way I came in without choking Tifa. I sighed heavily and decided to sit down to figure a way out.
11111121211111211.title: Die parasite, die!

choices: I try to talk with Tifa
I think of another brilliant plan
111111212111112111.content:
I sat down on the fleshy non-acid area of her stomach. I closed my eyes and began to reflect on the situation, and to meditate.
"There´s no fear, there´s no pain, there´s no death, there´s only the force." I whispered.
Suddenly, I heard a sound. That sound was like a thrust into my heart: Tifa cried. She cried about me.
"Sith...Please, wherever you are, come back! Please be alive! I...I failed, I couldn´t protect you! I´m not worth of being your girlfriend!"
I couldn´t stand that anymore. I couldn´t let her worry so much. Although I was amazed again about how much she cares for me. I put my lightsaber (I just love that!) back onto my belt and stood up. The whole pink, fleshy chamber was rather calm, as most of Tifa´s lunch already went down her intestines. I now made a decision.
111111212111112111.title: Tifa´s concern

1111112121111121111.content:
I closed my eyes and focused my mind. I called out to Tifa.
"Tifa..."
"Sith?" asked Tifa aloud. I could tell that she had stopped crying and got up from a chair. The movements didn't disturb me; I stayed standing.
"Tifa.." I said through the force.
"Sith?" asked Tifa. "where are you?"
"Inside you" I said. "you accidently swallowed me alive. But, don't..."
"Oh my gosh!" yelled Tifa. "I am SO sorry...err...you're still alive?"
"Yes..." I said. "I don't know why. Perhaps the materia that shrunk me has other powers as well"
"Sith..." said Tifa. "how are you gonna get out?"
"I don't know..." I said sadly.
"Well...I could throw you up" said Tifa.
"Either way, I'm going to be covered in something" I said dryly. If Tifa threw me up, I would be covered in her salvia...and if I went the natural way...I didn't want to think about that.
"Yes" said Tifa. "but you can't stay in my stomach for the rest of your life"
"I may have to..." I whispered.
"Don't say that!" yelled Tifa. "Now you gotta make a decision. Shall I throw you up, or do you go the natural way...?"
1111112121111121111.title: Talking to Tifa

choices: I get thrown up, and Tifa and me are glad
I tell her about less disgusting possibilities
11111121211111211111.content:
I sighed.
"I guess getting thrown up would be the best idea. But still, I´m not too happy with that. It would be disgusting for you, and I don´t want that."
"You´re worrying about me? Sith, that´s really kind of you, but you should worry about you!"
"Why? Your acids don´t hurt me, and besides, it´s not that bad inside your belly."
I could hear her giggling for a moment, and it was calming somehow.
"Wait, I´ve got an idea. There might be other possibilities to get out of your body."
"Hm..."
Tifa was thinking about my proposal, and...
11111121211111211111.title: Possibilities

choices: Teleported myself out of Tifa's body
decided to stay in Tifa's stomach
111111212111112111112.content:
"There might be another way..." I said.
"How?" asked Tifa.
"I haven't used this before.." I whispered. "I could teleport myself out of here..but.."
"But what?" asked Tifa.
"But it's meant for going through walls, and not flesh. It could be ugly if...." I didn't want to think about what would happen.
"Any other ways?" asked Tifa.
I thought hard. There was just no way getting out of Tifa's body without being disgusting.
"I can't think of another way..." I said.
"Why not try teleporting?" asked Tifa.
I sighed and...
111111212111112111112.title: There's always a way...

choices: I stay overnight, and next day, I finally leave Tifa
I find a way to get out of Tifa
1111112121111121111122.content:
"Well, I guess I´ll stay here until we find a way. Right now, I can´t think of something completely safe."
"But Sith..."
"Oh, I´m sorry. I know, it might be disgusting for you when I stay inside you any longer."
"No, no, that´s no problem. It´s just..."
She began to breathe heavily.
"I´m so worried about you. I´m still terrified about the thought of...unwittingly killing you. What if something in my body kills you? What should I do then? I don´t even want to think about a life without you! I need you! I love you, Sith!"
I didn´t know what to say. These words were so passionate, and so convincing, that I was almost in tears. I carefully touched Tifa´s stomach walls and whispered her name.
"Tifa...don´t worry. I won´t die inside you and let you all alone. I...have a powerful "ally" (the force ;)) who will guide me."
We both didn´t say anything right now, but I noticed that Tifa´s breathing calmed down. That showed me that Tifa was a bit relieved.
1111112121111121111122.title: Tifa and me

11111121211111211111221.content:
I stayed in Tifa's stomach all day and into the night. Tifa and me talked about old times and other things. Tifa ate dinner, and I ate some of it as it landed in the stomach. I caught about half the food that Tifa ate, the other half wound up in stomach acid. Bedtime came, and Tifa slept. Tifa's heartbeat slowed slighlty as she slept.
I slept also (even Jedi need thier sleep ;) ) and woke early. Tifa was still sleeping and an idea came to me. Tifa's stomach shifted when she was lying down. I could climb up her throat and out of her mouth that way*
Still, something can go terribly wrong with that plan. Tifa could choke on me. But, what choice do I have? I started towards the way to her throat.




*See "Shrinking Down to Size" on writing.com
11111121211111211111221.title: Overnight in a belly

choices: ...I decided to stay inside her belly until Tifa´s awake
...she choked on me and I ended up in her lungs
111111212111112111112212.content: So I started to go up her throat, but...you could say that the plan didn´t work, because...
111111212111112111112212.title: What the...?

choices: more parasites come to protect the queen
1111112121111121111122122.content:
I was half-way Tifa's throat. I was at the opening of the windwipe when it happened. Tifa coughed suddenly, sending me into the windpipe and I went down to her lungs!
In Tifa's lung, her breathing sounded like a strong wind. But I managed not to fall over.

"Just great..." I muttered. "soon as I find out a way out of here, I'll be in another place in Tifa's body!"

Suddenly, I caught a glimpse of something in the lung. I looked over and gasped. It was another parasite! This parasite was slightly bigger than the parasite I killed in Tifa's stomach.

"Where are all these parasites coming from?" I asked as I took my lightsaber and easily sliced it in two.

"From me..." said a husky female voice.

I turned around and saw a towering insect-like female. She had two legs and two arms, but the rest was like an insect. She was two feet taller than I was.

"Aha, The Queen" I said.
1111112121111121111122122.title: Parasite Queen

choices: I killed the queen after an easy fight
11111121211111211111221222.content:
I was getting really angry.
"You slimy, ugly filth! Why are you doing this to Tifa? And why on earth are you able to communicate with me?"
That disgusting piece of dirt just laughed as more parasites appeared, trying to protect their queen.
"I´ve got a bad feeling about this."
I began to attack these vermins without igniting my saber. I pointed at them with my hands, and I threw force lightning (like Dooku or Palpatine ;) ); and hit every single parasite. They died immediately with immense pain. But I had to be careful, as I didn´t want to hit Tifa´s lungs.
After the vermins vanished, I looked on the queen.
"As you can see, it is pointless to resist. This is your last chance. Leave Tifa´s body at once, or die."
"Ha, ha, ha. You fool! I´m gonna stay and fullfill my duty. I´m gonna take care of that foolish girl!"
"How did you call Tifa?!"
"Anyway, I´m gonna kill you first, slowly!"
"Are you threatening me, parasite scum?"
With these words, I revealed my lightsaber (like Palpatine in the theatrical trailer for Episode III ;) ), and rushed towards the queen.
11111121211111211111221222.title: Force lightning

111111212111112111112212222.content:
All of a sudden, Tifa woke up. I knew this because of two things: she yawned and she got into a sitting position. The lungs shifted around me and the queen so that the 'floor' became a 'wall'. I managed to grab onto the queen so I wouldn't fall. The yawn that Tifa made caused the queen to slip slightly. I took out my lightsaber and cut one of the queen's arms.

"Very impressive toy you got there" said the Queen. "but...behold!"

The arm that I had just cut off grew back!

"What the...?" I asked.

"Hehe...You'll never defeat me" said the queen.

"How did you do that?!" I asked.

"I won't reveal my secrets" said the Queen. "let's just say that Tifa helped me grow another arm...haha"

"YOU FLITH!" I screamed so loudly that Tifa could've heard me.

"HAHA..." said the queen. "we shall meet again"

And with that, the queen vanished!

"COME BACK HERE!" I yelled. "I WILL HUNT YOU DOWN AND PUNISH YOU FOR WHAT YOU DID TO TIFA!!"

A laugh echoed through the lungs (like in Doom 3).

Suddenly, I realized something that I haven't noticed before. I sensed the Force was with the queen! And it was the dark side. This puzzled me because why I hadn't sensed her earlier? Could she hide behind the Force? That was possible. The dark side clouds everything. Could the queen be a sith lord? Or...Sith Lady I should say. I haven't heard of a female Sith Lord, but it could be possible I suppose.
111111212111112111112212222.title: Insect Sith Lord?

choices: I tell Tifa, and I travel through her body, hunting the queen
1111112121111121111122122221.content:
I was still hanging at the "lung-wall", but I let go off the wall and I fell down. After a few seconds, I landed on Tifa´s soft, grey "lung bottom".
"Tifa helped me grow these arms..." I whispered. I didn´t even want to think about the possibilities, but I knew for sure that I had to hunt that creature down and help Tifa. Just then, Tifa began to talk.
"Sith, are you awake?"
"Yes, Tifa." I said as calm as possible.
"Well, good morning then! Did you sleep well?"
"Erh, yes, actually."
"Hi, hi, that´s fine."
"Tifa, I have to tell you something. I am no longer inside your stomach."
I sighed.
"I am now inside your lungs."
Tifa was upset. I noticed that as she breathed heavily now.
"What?! How?"
"That doesn´t matter now. But listen up, Tifa. I have to tell you something..."
Just then, Tifa began to groan in pain.
"Tifa!!!! Tifa, what is it?!"
"Ugh, Sith...it...hurts...my body...hurts."
"Damn it! That thing made Tifa sick!"
"Sith...what does that mean?"
"Alright, I´ll tell you."
1111112121111121111122122221.title: Tifa´s getting sick

11111121211111211111221222211.content:
I tell Tifa all about the parasites and about the parasite queen.
"Oh God! That's terrible!" said Tifa. She groaned in pain again.
"Where does it hurt?" I asked.
"My chest..." said Tifa. "feels like someone is sticking a knife in me right in my chest...at my heart"
That's where the queen probably went. But how could I get to her heart? Entering Tifa's bloodstream is the best way to get to her heart, but that could take a long time.
"Sith" said Tifa. "please help....ouch!!"
"What?" I asked.
"Now my stomach hurts too...I don't feel very good" said Tifa.
"Okay" I said. "I'm pretty sure the parasite queen is in your stomach or at your heart. I'm in your lungs"
"I might throw up any minute" said Tifa. "my stomach..."
Suddenly, Tifa ran to the bathroom and threw up. It was chaos in the lungs. I fell back in the windpipe and entered her throat again. By that time, Tifa had stopped throwing up.
"Back to the stomach for me" I said as I jumped down the throat to the stomach.
I entered the stomach a minute later and saw that many parasite were in there, but the queen wasn't there. I killed all the parasites in the stomach with my lightsaber and...
11111121211111211111221222211.title: Back in the stomach

111111212111112111112212222111.content:
It was terrible. There were still more parasites coming. Right now, I could feel the hatred swelling inside me. Why did they do this to Tifa? Why? I began to scream with anger and furiously attacked the group of parasites. I slashed them in two, one by one, and they weren´t even able to attack me. I may not look like a strong warrior (as I said, more like an ordinary person), but I´m still capable of such incredible reflexes, jumps and attacks, "for my ally is the force, and a powerful ally it is." (Yoda, Episode V ;) ).
I killed almost every single one of them, until there were only 5 left. I force-pushed them into a lake of stomach acids, and they died soon. That was it. I looked around, and the pink pulsating chamber I was in began to calm. I took a deep breath and deactivated my saber. I stared at the lake of acids for a moment, with no emotion in my face.
"Sith, do you hear me?"
These words were so relieving. It was good to hear Tifa.
"Yes, I do."
"Sith, the pain in my stomach is gone."
"That´s good news."
"Thank you so much, Sith! Ugh..."
Tifa began to groan again.
"Tifa, what is it?!"
"My heart..."
"I see. Well, I guess there´s no choice. Looks like I have to enter your bloodstream, and then..."
The thought of entering Tifa´s heart was incredible. Entering her kind, pure heart, and rescuing her.
"Tifa, listen. I´ll have to make a cut into your flesh in order to enter your bloodstream. It might hurt a little, but you won´t be seriously damaged. Ok?"
"Ok. I trust you, Sith."
But now, I heard a voice again. A voice I hated much more than anything else. The parasite queen.
"He, he. You have done well so far, Sith. Looks like I underestimated you. Soon, we´ll meet again for our final battle!"
The voice diappeared, and I just screamed.
"You´ll pay for what you did to Tifa!! I swear it!"
"Sith..."
Tifa seemed to be relieved and a bit worried.
111111212111112111112212222111.title: Anger

1111112121111121111122122221111.content:
I activated my lightsaber. Well..now or never. I cut a small hole in Tifa's stomach. Tifa gave out a yelp of pain.
I jumped into the hole and entered her bloodstream. It was interesting to see blood cells traveling along with me. I was bigger than the blood cells, but not by much.
It took me about 45 minutes to get to her heart. The bloodstream had taken me all over Tifa's body--although I couldn't tell which part of her body I was in. Finally, I reached the heart. The beating of the heart was deafening now. I entered the heart and found out why Tifa was in pain. For the inner part of the heart wss covered in parasites! There must have been MILLIONS of these parasites.
"Hehe" said the voice of the queen. "Very soon now, Sith"

"Show yourself!" I yelled.
"Not quite yet" said the queen.
1111112121111121111122122221111.title: Heart of Tifa

11111121211111211111221222211112.content: Millions of parasites, making my girlfriend suffer. I knew that I had to destroy them, but it would have been pointless, as there were too many of them, and it was too dangerous for Tifa as well. I absolutely didn´t want to hurt Tifa´s heart. So destroying the queen first would be the best idea. But where was that ugly thing? I knew for sure that it wasn´t inside Tifa´s heart so I tried to sense the queen...successfully: the queen was hiding inside Tifa´s brain. I could feel her presence through the force. Nevertheless, before taking down the queen, I had to take care of all the parasites inside Tifa´s heart, and yet I thought it wasn´t safe enough for Tifa to kill all these vermins inside her heart. So I got an idea: I would force them into her bloodstream. So the parasites would be out of Tifa´s heart for awhile. It wouldn´t be easy, but what could go wrong with the guidance of the force?
11111121211111211111221222211112.title: What about these parasites?

It took me the better part of the day to force all the parasites into Tifa's bloodstream. Finally, I had gotten the last one out of her heart.
"I feel better" said Tifa. Her voice was barely heard thanks to the deafening beating of the heart. I smiled. To the queen!

1111112121111121111122122221111211111112.content:
It was way easier than I thought. Lucia´s attacks were powerful, but her hatred weakened her defense.
"You can´t win, Lucia. Surrender and end this foolishness."
"Never!"
Lucia tried everything, she even used some powerful Sith-abilities, like the legendary Sith-lightning, but fortunately I was able to dodge.
"You´re holding your saber too tight, Lucia."
My powers were indeed far beyond hers. She might have been a very good fighter, but Grievous was right. I was more powerful.
"You´re not able to control your fear and your hatred. That makes you weak."
I now put an end to this. With a precise strike I destroyed her lightsaber. She fell down on the slippery grey ground of Tifa´s brain.
"You are beaten."
"Yes...You won, Sith. Kill me now, and save your girlfriend."
"No."
"What?!"
"I won´t kill you. I won´t kill a person I once adored so much."
"Sith..."
"But I beg you: please make the parasites in Tifa´s body disappear. Tifa never hurt you; you punished an innocent girl."
"...alright, Sith. You´re right. What I´ve done was terrible, and can´t be forgiven for this. Thank you, Sith, for showing me the light again. And I´ll now make the parasites disappear."
After a few seconds, I could hear Tifa talking.
"Sith, do you hear me? The pain in my body is gone! You did it!"
"Thank you, Lucia."
It was a somehow strange situation. My former enemy Lucia and me were standing inside the brain of my best friend Tifa.
Meanwhile on the outside, Jero defeated the white rider and his minions. The horsemen were gone, but the ultimate villain was still there: Sephrot.

"What? Where are you."
"Tifa already told you."
"He´s inside my body, Cloud."
"What? Inside Tifa?"
"Yes. See, I shrank down to microscopic size, Tifa accidentally swallowed me, I discovered parasites inside her body, destroyed them, traveled through her whole body and now I´m inside her brain, or inside her mind, to be precise. We joined forces, you could say."
"Wow."
Meanwhile, inside Tifa´s mind. Tifa and Sith were standing near each other in a strange environment.
"Sith...do you think it will be over when we defeat Seproth?"
"Yes, I´m sure bout that. Then, everything will return to normal."
"Then...we can live together again. I do hope you´re right, Sith."
"Well, maybe I´ll be a bit disapointed. I somehow like it being inside your body. It feels great somehow."
"Thanks, Sith."
"Now, we´ll defeat this Seproth together. Tifa/Sith, you could say."
"Sounds cool."
"Let´s do this!"
"Yeah!"
Outside Tifa´s mind, Seproth appeared. A slick warrior, much like Sephiroth. He smiled with an evil expression.
"At last I will have revenge."

1111112121111121111122122221111211111112.title: A choice from the heart not from the brain

choices: "...we have to fight them one by one, unfortunately."
1111112121111121111122122221111211111112.content:
The sound of the wobbling mass of Tifa´s brain and the sound of the two lightsabers buzzing created a tension that engulfed me. Lucia...the beautiful girl who was once my best friend was now helpless and disarmed, kneeling on the grey flesh of Tifa´s brain. There was no chance at all for her to strike back or to get an advantage again. Her life was now in my hands. To my surprise, Lucia didn´t beg for mercy. She remained silent and stared at me, with a strange expression in her eyes. There was no anger in her eyes, and no fear as well. I rather saw that redemption and understanding, as if she realized what she had done and that she would accept death as punishment for tormenting Tifa. She even nodded slightly to me.
So I made a decision. Perhaps the most important in my entire life. I deactivated both sabers.
"Lucia...even though you did terrible things to Tifa and tormented her from within, you´re still one of the few true friends I ever had. My feelings for you are still strong, even after all these years."
"Sith..."
"And...I can´t kill a disarmed and helpless opponent. Only a coward would act like that. You are beaten, and I see in your eyes that you realize the vile nature of your doing."
"..."
"Can you promise me to stop all this? To return to your normal older self? Lucia...I beg you."
"Sith...I´m...I´m so sorry. I was so jealous of Tifa...that I even forgot about how you feel. I didn´t realize that you and Tifa are happy together. I know that I cannot redeem my deeds, but please accept my apologies."
"I accept, Lucia."
"Thank you, Sith. Thank you so much. But...I wish Tifa accepted my apologies as well. What I did to her was terrible and incredibly cruel, perhaps I can never redeem my deeds."
"Don´t worry, Lucia. I forgive you."
We both were surprised when we heard Tifa´s voice. So it appears that she could hear everything going on in her head, just like our dialogue.
"Tifa! Do you...really forgive me?"
"Of course. What you did is wrong, and you know that yourself. But you did it because you were in love...I can understand that. Sometimes we act strangely when we deeply and truly love someone. Besides...the parasites might have hurt my body, but it wasn´t that bad. In fact, it was just a piece of cake!"
"Tifa...now I understand why Sith loves you that much. You´re such a kind-hearted person...Thank you."
"Don´t mention it. Let´s just forget everything that has transpired so far. Anyway...have you any idea how to get all those parasites out of my body, Sith?"
"Not yet. Lucia, can you help us?"
"Well..."

1111112121111121111122122221111211111112.title: possessed

1111112121111121111122122221111211111112.content:
Lucia kept attacking me with her saber, yet these were only futile attempts. I didn´t take me long to disarm her, and after that I force-pushed her onto the wall of Tifa´s brain, making her unconscious for a while.
"Ouch!"
"Sorry, Tifa."
"Never mind. What on earth happened in my head? Is Lucia all right?"
"No, she isn´t. I don´t know, but...it seems as if she were possessed by someone."
"Now that explains a lot...maybe someone used her jealousy in order to gain control over her..."
"Maybe. But we better get Lucia to a safe place now. I´m sorry, but the parasites will have to wait."
"Don´t worry. As I said, they don´t hurt that much anymore."
I lifted Lucia´s body up and held her in my arms. I looked into her face, and I was able to see the pain she felt.
"Lucia...who did this to you? ...well, first I´ll get you outta here. If you´ll excuse me, Tifa."
"Huh?"
Before she could even answer, I kicked a certain part of Tifa´s brain, which caused her whole brain to shake.
"Ah! Ah-ah-choooo!"
I can´t remember much, since everything went on so fast, but I found myself on the palm of Tifa´s hand together with Lucia, covered in a sticky substance.
"Sorry, Tifa."
She scratched her nose a bit, looking annoyed.
"You could have warned me at least."
"Come on, Tifa, it was just a sneeze!"
"Oh well..."
She then smiled again and looked at me and Lucia.
"So that´s Lucia. Wow. She´s gorgeous! Looks like you have a good taste in women, huh?" she said with a funny voice.
"What are we gonna do with her?" I asked.
"She needs a place to rest."
"Well, she could rest on my bed. It´s a bit huge for her size, but it´s soft and comfortable, so I think it will be all right."
"Thanks, Tifa!"
So she carefully placed Lucia - who was still unconscious - on the surface of her bed.
"And what are you gonna do now, Sith?"
"...I guess I´ll go back into your body and take care of those parasites."
"..."
"What´s wrong?"
"N-nothing. It´s just...well, now you finally got out of my body, and you can´t imagine how glad I am to see you again. I don´t want you to disappear again."
"Come on, I won´t be long. And no harm will come to me!"
"Promise?"
"Promise!"
With these words, she held her little finger before me, and I touched it as some sign of trust between us.
1111112121111121111122122221111211111112.title: Leaving Tifa´s inner side...how long?

choices: Lucia - no longer possessed - accompanied me
1111112121111121111122122221111211111112.content:
After this kind gesture between Tifa and me, I prepared to leave for her inside again. But I didn´t know what was about to happen back then. In front of us, a strange picture appeared, as if it was on a TV-screen. A scary looking person could be seen there, or at least his upper body, covered in clothes resembling the ones Sephiroth wore.
"What the---?! Seproth!"
"Hello there, Sith. Long time no see."
"What are you doing here?"
"Is that all you have to say about our reunion? Hahaha! How´s Lucia?"
"!!!How do you know?!"
Suddenly, Tifa looked at Seproth´s appearance.
"Are you responsible for Lucia´s being possessed?!"
"Hm. You sure are sharp, Tifa. And pretty hot! Hahaha!"
"So you are behind the appearance of the parasites as well...why are you doing this to Tifa and Lucia?!"
"Don´t you see? It´s the perfect way of having revenge!"
"?"
"Hehehe. Since you can´t stop the inevitable, I guess I can tell you. I want avenge Sephiroth, my beloved brother. And Tifa´s body is the key."
"My...body?"
"When Sephiroth hit you with his sword in Nibelheim back then, you were infected with Jenova cells."
"I...I have Jenova´s cells in my body?!" Tifa said almost in tears.
"Mwahaha! These cells can provide one with incredible power, but one has to awaken their powers first."
"So...you used Lucia and the parasites to gain Jenova´s power."
"Clever, huh? Destroy the parasites, if you want. They´re no longer of any use. They already awakened the power within Tifa. All I have to do now is to gain control over Tifa´s body, and I´ll be able to destroy Cloud. Imagine, Tifa. You´ll kill your childhood friend with your own hands! Mwahahaha!"
"Stop mocking us, you bastard!"
Seproth kept laughing maniacally for a few seconds until he could calm down.
"Stay right where you are, Seproth!"
"Oh, you wanna stop me and save Tifa? Hm, sounds like fun. I´ll be waiting inside Tifa. Au revoir, mon amie!"
The picture of Seproth disappeared, just as quickly as it appeared.
"Tifa, we have to hurry! I must get inside you again, before he can gain control over you!"
"Yes..."
"Tifa, I´ll get rid of him and everything else that caused so much pain for you and Lucia, I promise!"
"Sith...good luck!"

1111112121111121111122122221111211111112.content:
Sith was pinned against the stomache wall, and there was nothing he could do. Sephroth grinned at this, to say the least. Perhaps, he thought, I'll take him outside this girl to finish him, so she can watch. Wouldn't that be fun!

Sith, meanwhile, was in intense pain with both swords sticking into his shoulders. "You bastard..." Sith grunted through his teeth.

Sephroth just laughed. "You know, maybe I'll just finish you right now. Save myself any trouble in the future by eliminating the main roadblock. Farewe-"

"GODDAMNIT, I TURN AROUND FOR ONE SECOND AND YOU GUYS START QUOTING MOVIES AGAIN!"

"Wha?" Sephroth looked up suddenly, searching for the voice. Sith just sighed in relief though, since he knew that cocky egoism anywhere.

"You know Drez, it's not really a bad movie to quote when you think about it!" Sith yelled back at the top of the stomache.

Sephroth groaned to himself. "Everytime I almost win, this place turns into a circus..."

"And what's that supposed to mean?" Drez asked as he landed down in between Sith and Sephroth. Looking back over his shoulder, he noticed the sword sticking out of Sith. "I'm not the one ripping of big movie scenes. I mean, god! Two swords instead of one! That will sure prevent a lawsuite from Square Enix!"

Drez then reached behind him with both hands, pulled both the swords out of Sith ("Ow, goddamnit!"), and tossed them back to Sephroth. "Two swords against two swords sounds fair. As well as a bit more original."

Sephroth stood up straight, holding both swords out from his side. "You two always get in my way! I won't have it again!" A dark aura started to surround him, and his eyes started to glow. His hair started to float around his head, and a dark haze settled over the floor... I mean, stomache.

Drez stood back while Sith pulled himself up. "Well, this is a new transformation."

Sith looked at Drez with skeptism. "Yeah, well if you hadn't showed up he probably wouldn't have bothered showing it. Now he's gonna hurt us."

"I pity you, who understands nothing."

"Shut up."

111111212111121.content:
So Tifa carefully put me onto the palm of her right hand and walked upstairs to her room. As a matter of act, the whole house looked just like the one Tifa and her parents used to live in before Nibelheim was destroyed, but as you know, the village was rebuilt by SHINRA, and so Tifa´s house as well. It was sometimes a bit hard for her to live there, since it brought back some dear memories of her parents; it even made her cry from time to time.
"Well, here we are." she said as she opened the door to her room. It was quite an ordinary room, there were all the things you´d expect from a cute girl´s room: her soft bed, a writing desk, a bookshelf (with all kinds of books; like books about arithmetic, poetry, biology or some novels, in any case she had a good taste) and of course a piano. Tifa could play the piano masterfully, and it was a joy to listen to her.
Next to her bed, there was the dollhouse she spoke of. She removed the roof of the house and placed me next to a bed. I looked around only to see that it was an ordinary room I was in. Yet it was a bit disturbing to see that even a doll-bed was too big for me. I even had problems to get onto the bed due to my size.
"I´m sorry, but I don´t have a smaller bed."
"Don´t worry, it´s okay for me. Anyway, I´m gonna sleep now. Good night, Tifa."
"Good night, Sith."
She yawned and sat down on her bed. It only took her a few minutes to fall asleep, but I stayed awake for quite some time.

"Here we go again." Lucia said as we landed in Tifa´s stomach.
"Takes us back to the old days." I replied. You know, I´m getting used to this situation. I have explored the insides and innards of several cute and gorgeous women, and I can´t complain: it´s quite nice in a girl´s stomach, especially Tifa´s. Well, some might say it´s disgusting, but I somehow feel great in there: listening to the rythm of the heartbeat, the rythm of life is a wonderful thing, and being near to the girl you love is a great feeling as well. I looked around and it was exactly the same as before: the glitchy, pink walls of her stomach which were pulsating, her calming heartbeat, everything was there.
"Sith, Lucia, are you okay?"
"Yep. Everything´s all right."
"Whew...I´m relieved."
"Sith, if you´ll excuse me, I´ll take a short walk through Tifa´s innards. Is that okay for you, Tifa?"
"Sure, no problem. But please be careful in there. Who knows what awaits you in the depths of my belly."
She began to giggle a bit.
"Don´t worry, I will." Lucia said as she headed for Tifa´s intestines.
"Say, Sith...how about we talk a bit before we go to sleep?"
"Sure."
For almost an hour, we spoke about different things. Of course about her growth, but also about other things. Like her natural beauty (I´m sure she reddened when I told her how stunningly gorgeous and natural she actually is); she just replied that she doesn´t like to put on things like make-up or nail polish, so that might be a reason for her great look. I also teased her a bit from time to time by tickling her stomach walls, which caused her to laugh loud and her stomach walls to shake. After quite some time, she was getting tired.
"Uh...good night, Sith. Sleep well."
"Thanks, Tifa. Good night."
When I was sitting there, listening to how Tifa was breathing, I thought about what would happen next...and by the way, Lucia was late. Was she still in Tifa´s innards? To be revealed soon ;)

Lucia and me were still standing on Tifa´s shoulder, and of course she wasn´t able to notice us. The person who controlled her made her following his plans; it was as if she was thrown out of her own mind.
"We must help her immediately." Lucia said.
"Yes, but first, we must try to stop her from getting to Midgar and destroying the reactors."
"How?"
"Come on, think. We´re Jedi knights, forgot?"
"Oh...I realize what you mean..."
"Let´s go, then."
We bravely jumped down from Tifa´s shoulder. As she was so incredibly huge, we fell down quite some time, but we were able to survive the fall since we had the force to protect us (ever saw, say, Mace Windu in Clone Wars?). Tifa was only about one kilometre away from Midgar, so we had to act quick.
"Allright, then."
Now, we used the legendary force push (like Obi-Wan and Anakin in Episode III) in order to stop Tifa. Of course we couldn´t push her back, but at least we could prevent her from going on.
"Damn, I can´t stand this too long. Sith, we must find another way."
"But...ugh...it´s the only way right now..."
"No." a familiar voice said: Cloud Strife, who arrived on his motorcycle. Cloud Strife...my rival, Tifa´s true love interest? I hope not, but that wasn´t important right now.
"Wow...Tifa really is incredibly huge."
"What are you doing here, Cloud?"
"Trying to help you."
"How?"
"Materia. SLEEP!" Cloud casted a sleep-spell on Tifa, and luckily it worked. Tifa fell onto the ground (without hitting us) and started to sleep like a baby.
"Thank you, Cloud." Lucia said.
"But now we must try to, well, "return" Tifa´s mind and save her. She is controlled by someone, so we..."

11121.content: Aerith Gainsbrough was a very strange child. Everyone in the Sector 5 Slums knew it. They knew it when she came to Midgar. Elmerya had adopted her. When Cloud had fell from the sky on that fateful day, Aerith was watering her flowers. Aerith sensed rather than heard Cloud was coming. She didn't know who was he, but she did know that he was about to crash into the chruch! Thinkinh quickly, Aerith had activated her very special materia. The one that belonged to her real mother. Before she knew it, Aerith was growing! Her clothes grew with her as she forced her way through the roof. She then catched the man who was falling from above. Aerith had stopped growing until she was a foot taller than the chruch. She looked down to see the man she had caught. He had blond hair and a very thick sword. 1112211.content:
It has been a while since the destruction of Meteor. Life for most of the people of Gaia was now slowly getting normal again. Also for Yuffie Kisaragi. She has been a materia hunter since she was only 14 years old, and now that she has defeated the threat through Sephiroth together with her friends, she could go after her bussiness again. And indeed, there was something which gained Yuffie´s interest. She heard about a rare materia with unknown yet unbelievable powers. Yuffie knew that she had to find this materia, even if her village didn´t need her stealing-abilities anymore.
It wouldn´t take her long to find it. She is an experienced materia hunter, so she knows exactly where to look for materia, and she also got some valid information about its location: somewhere near Junon. So she hopped onboard of some ship for Junon. Thankfully, Junon wasn´t far away from the Wutai-continent, so the trip on the ship lasted only about a day. Yuffie was glad when the voyage ended; her stomach can´t take voyages on sea as well as voyages with airships. In Junon harbor, shortly after she left the ship, something unexpected happened. A rather old man with a long white beard and a grey cape with a hood - almost looking like a wizard - appeared in front of Yuffie.
"Miss Kisaragi, I assume."
"How do you know my name?!"
"That´s not important. I guess you´re searching for this?"
He held a green materia in his right hand, and Yuffie realized that it had to be the materia she´s been looking for.
"Well, I want you to take the materia."
"What?! But why?!"
"Let´s just say that...I´m an admirer of your skills."
He gave Yuffie the materia with a grandfather-like smile.
"Thank you, sir."
"But be careful. Its usage could cause you a lot of trouble."
After these words, the man walked away. Yuffie looked at the materia in her hand, still surprised that the man donated the materia just like that.
1112211.title: A present for Yuffie

choices: Yuffie grows to be 500 feet tall
11122111.content:
The boat back to Wutai didn't leave until tomorrow, so Yuffie found a hotel to stay the night. She had collected about a million gil from her adventures with Cloud and the others. Yuffie heard that Cloud had moved into the vila in the city of Costa Del Sol. Tifa had moved in with Cloud also. Cait Sith returned to the Golden Saucer to be a fortune teller. Red XIII lived in Cosmo Canyon. Barret had moved into Midgar, since he wasn't welcomed back in his old hometown. Vincent had disappeared...Yuffie didn't know where Vincent went. Aerith was still dead...still at the bottom of the lake in the Forgotten City.
Yuffie got a room on the bottom floor of the hotel and spent the night in her room. That's when the green materia started to glow. It was around midnight when Yuffie started to grow. At the time, Yuffie was having a dream where she found the biggest materia of them all.

111221112.content: Soon, the hotel Yuffie was in began to burst because of her growth. The hotel was gone completely, only several parts were left, and she was still growing. Thankfully, the people who were in the hotel during the growth were able to escape. Before they were crushed by Yuffie, they ran out of the hotel and tried to alert everyone in Junon. Nearly everyone in Junon left his or her house, trying to get out of the city. Of course, Yuffie didn´t notice anything since she was still sleeping, dreaming of that huge materia. After the complete evacuation of the city, hundreds of people watched from a safe distance this terrible mess: the whole city was soon covered under Yuffie´s monstrous body. The (former) inhabitants of Junon looked at each other in shock. Their home was gone, destroyed by a sleeping, growing giantess. Minutes later, Yuffie´s growth stopped. According to the calculations of one of the inhabitants (obviously a scientist), the girl must have been over 500 feet tall, between 800 and 1000 feet. The question was now what to do. Wake the girl up? Call someone for help? But who? Shinra couldn´t help anymore, it was gone, so who else could help? The sight of a (indeed cute) giantess tossing about in the ruins of the once glorious city of Junon during her sleep was enough to tell the people: there is no help.

But there was help coming. A man with strange robes arrived behind the crowd. He looked kinda scary, yet determined.
"Do you have any problems?" he asked.
"Problems?!" one of the people shouted.
"Look at that! A sleeping giantess in the ruins of our hometown!"
"Why don´t you wake her up and talk with her about this situation?"
"Are you a fool? It´s too dangerous! Look at her size! One wrong movement during her sleep, and she´d crush us!"
"I see. I´ll wake her up then."
"You´re crazy!"
"I just want to help you. Besides, I know the girl."
"And who are you?!"
"Vincent Valentine, at your service."

11122111221.content:
That was just typical for someone like Yuffie - or at least Vincent thought so. She once again managed to get herself into quite a predicament by carelessly using a materia she didn´t know much about. Vincent himself heard about a certain growth materia before, but he would have never imagined to see it in action or its results. Approaching the gigantic cute girl, Vincent also realized how monstrously huge Yuffie now was. How ironic that she still was sleeping, not realizing what happened to her and the whole city of Junon.
Vincent knew that he had to get in contact with Yuffie. She first had to realize her situation and to be aware of her size. And standing before Yuffie´s vast belly, which was in a horizontal position due to the fact she was still lying there, he decided to climb onto her belly first. Normally it would take some time, but Vincent managed to accomplish the climb in under a minute, which was quite impressive due to the sheer size of Yuffie. Now he was standing on a vast field of skin, Yuffie´s bare belly. It almost seemed like some vast wasteland of skin, with Yuffie´s head slightly visible in the distance. Vincent also realized that Yuffie´s skin was quite soft, and that she was quite cute herself, but he didn´t care about that. He didn´t care about women since the loss of his dear Lucrecia.
He walked over her belly fast, and after quite some time he reached Yuffie´s breasts, which weren´t that big, thus not that difficult to pass. After having passed her breasts, he managed to jump onto Yuffie´s throat, which was quite a long tube, then he walked along her soft throat until he reached her chin. Climbing it, he finally arrived on her face, which was also in a horizontal position. There he noticed something strange on Yuffie´s huge lips. At the edge of her upper lip, there seemed to be a materia, almost in the small gap between her lower and upper lip. That must have been the growth materia. Vincent knew that he could take the materia and try out a reverse spell on Yuffie. But he also knew that it would be dangerous. Once he was on Yuffie´s lips and she accidentally opened her mouth...he knew the consequences.

11411.content:
(This story takes place shortly after Tidus, Yuna and the others defeated Yunalesca. They´re still in Zanarkand, so it is before the showdown with Sin takes place).
"So, how do we defeat Sin now, Yunie? The final aeon is not a choice anymore." Rikku said. Yuna didn´t say a thing. She and her friends have defeated Lady Yunalesca, so Yuna didn´t have to loose her life in a fight with Sin. But she had no idea how to save Spira now.
"Don´t worry, Yuna! I´ll think of something!" Tidus tried hard to cheer her up. She had to smile for a moment.
"But it will certainly be a hard task. Maybe we won´t be able to kill Sin. Maybe we´ll even die." Auron said with a worried expression.
Suddenly, a voice could be heard in the calm ruins of the huge city Zanarkand.
"Summoner Yuna, daughter of Lord Braska."
"W-what´s that voice?!" Rikku yelled in fear.
"If you wan´t to defeat Sin, then enter that room." A light emerged, and a door appeared in a wall.
"There I shall grant you an ability that is far more powerful than you could possibly imagine, Lady."
Without even thinking, Yuna went towards the door.
"Yunie, are you sure?"
"Yes. If there really is a possibility to defeat Sin, then I´ll go."
Yuna slowly entered the door. No one of Yuna´s friends knew what was about to happen. But then, something unexpected happened. Yuna was screaming.
"Yuna!" Tidus shouted, but then his face was getting pale. The room Yuna entered began to burst. Yuna was growing, incredibly fast!
"Everyone, run!" Auron shouted at the other, and they followed his lead. They quickly left the building, and they could see it break. Yuna was growing out of it, and soon she towered over the big city of Zanarkand. Her friends looked on the confused summoner in fear. What would happen now? And...how big was Yuna now?

1141211.content:
Thanks for the pleasentries, Angel. But now, back to work.
Hello, do you remember me? It´s me, Sith, the Micronian. Today I want to tell you the ultimate vore story with Yuna. It was long before I met Rikku, even before Sin was destroyed. Anyway, I used to live in a Micronian-village (I won´t tell where) together with my small sister, Ellie. She was only 15 years back then (me: 18), and after our parent´s death (when we were still small children), I had to take care for her. I really love my sister as much as a brother can possibly do, as we only have ourselves. One day, we decided to leave our village, as it was getting boring (and my sister was hoping that she could find the love of her live, but there weren´t that many Micronians out there). We both wanted to go on some adventures, yet we knew it could be dangerous for 2 people whit a height of 1/8 of an inch; so small that we almost weren´t visible for normal inhabitants of Spira.
Anyway, we started our trip around Spira and went to Besaid Island, a peaceful place, but dangerous for us. My sister an me were swimming in a small lake (lake for us), as I left the water.
"Sith, I´ll swimm a little longer, alright?"
"Yes, Ellie, but be careful."
I went away from the lake a few steps, just when I felt an earthquake. Well, not quite an earthquake, but it was an incredibly huge girl that was coming: summoner Yuna! She bowed down in front of the lake and put her hands into the water in order to drink.
"Ellie!"
"Sith, help me!"
Unfortunately, Yuna drank the water along with my sister. That was grave, as she wasn´t able to survive inside someone´s stomach; only male Micronians can do that. So I had to go after her into Yuna´s body. I saw that Yuna was going back into her house, and I quickly followed her. She went into the kitchen, so did I, and there I saw a glass of water.
"If I go into the glass, then..." you get the point, my vorephile friends. And a fantastic voyage was about to start; a voyage throughout Yuna´s whole body, searching for my sister.
1141211.title: My sister, swallowed by Yuna

choices: I reach Yuna´s stomach, but Ellie´s not there, but somewhere else
11412111.content: Everything was going as planned. Getting into the glass in time was no problem, and I now swam in the drinking-water. I just had to wait for Yuna to drink, and she quickly decided to. She grabbed the glass of water I was swimming in and brought it nearer and nearer towards her cavernous mouth.
11412111.title: Unnecessary chapter

114121111.content:
The water and me were now entering Yuna´s incredibly huge mouth. I got a short glimpse at the surroundings like her teeth or her dangling uvula, but after a few seconds, I was washed down her throat. I tried not to look at her wet shiny pink esophagus, but as a vorephile I couldn´t help but being amazed. Finally, I reached a ring of muscles, the pathway into Yuna´s stomach. The ring opened and I was pushed into her stomach with a plop. I was now swimming inside the water Yuna swallowed, and I immediately began to search for Ellie.
"ELLIE! ELLIE, WHERE ARE YOU?!" I shouted several times, but I didn´t get any answer. And I couldn´t see her inside Yuna´s vast stomach. Had she been...digested? No, it couldn´t be. Although Ellie couldn´t resist acids, I tought her many useful skills, and she was an intelligent girl, so she might have found a way to survive. Suddenly, everything begant to shake. I realized that Yuna stood up and was walking into her room, with me sloshing around inside her belly.
Now, I had to decide where to search for Ellie.

1141211112.content: Something was telling me that Ellie wasn´t inside Yuna´s digestive system anymore. But where else could she be? The only way to find that out would be...the brain. There I could easily locate Ellie (I´ll tell you later how). But the question was: how to enter her brain? There´s more than one way.
1141211112.title: The answer lies in Yuna´s brain

when I jumped into her lungs, Yuna coughed me up
11412111121.content: So I chose to go to her brain via the throat. I walked over to the entrance of Yuna´s stomach, and fortunately, the small ring that leads into the stomach was opened. But now the tricky part began. Since Yuna´s throat was pulsating all the time, it was immensely difficult not to loose my grip on her flesh. Besides, the throat was extremely wet due to all the saliva Yuna was swallowing, so I could have easily slipped. But thankfully, I made it to Yuna´s mouth after some climbing. From there I could see a second tube next to the esophagus: the windpipe, my next stop. So I had to jump in there.
11412111121.title: Up the throat

choices: you crawl through her nose into her brain
while crawling in her nose, you make Yuna sneeze you out
114121111211.content:
While I was standing inside Yuna´s mouth, I took a closer look at my surroundings. Her mouth was closed tightly, and warm blasts of air were passing me now and then. But no time for sightseeing. I had to rescue my sister, so I had to reach my next destination as quick as possible: her lungs. I looked down her throat and I could clearly see a tube next to the esophagus: her windpipe.
"Here we go."
And I boldly dived down her throat and into her windpipe, from where a short flight through the grey tube followed. Moments later I arrived in her lungs, and before getting out of control under her breathing process, I reached for the grey walls of her lungs. I successfully hold onto a small part of her lungs not far away from the entrance to the next stop: her nose. There would be a way to her brain from there. For a few moments, the large chamber of her lung began to shake a bit as Yuna was coughing. Must have been my doing. She surely had no idea of her microscopic passenger.
At last I started my climb up to her nose. It wasn´t easy since the air Yuna was breathing pressed me either up or down, but I didn´t lose my grip. Only a few minutes later I reached a hole that lead into a long tube, her nose. I took a last look at Yuna´s truly beautiful lung (the contracting grey walls and the steady breathing sure had something calming), before I began to climb into her nose.
114121111211.title: From the lungs to the nose

choices: ...toward a desk, with bottles of make-up on it
1141211112111.content:
I didn´t even have to crawl through Yuna´s nose, thanks to my tiny size. Anyway, the sight of a nose from inside sure is incredible, I can tell you. It´s a large, fleshy tube, with small hairs growing out of the walls. These hairs normally are there to prevent foreign bodies from entering the human body - and you could say that I happened to be a foreign body inside Yuna´s nose. The deeper I walked into Yuna´s nose and the nearer I got to her brain, the weaker the stream of air passing me got. I was really grateful, since it sure was annoying that whenever Yuna breathed in and out through her nose, this damn stream of air was threatening me to loose my balance. Anyway, after walking through the large tunnel of Yuna´s nose, I finally reached a strange looking, organic hole above me. I wasted no time, so I entered the "door". And you know what? I was inside an incredibly huge chamber, with gray fleshy folds everywhere, with synapses transporting informations throughout Yuna´s head - yes, I was inside Yuna´s brain. From my position, I could even see Yuna´s eyes from the inside, allowing me to take a look outside her body. And from what I could see - and hear - Yuna was still coughing slightly, pounding with her fist against her chest.
"What was that?" Yuna whispered, obviously puzzled.
Then Yuna started to walk, with the inside of her brain shaking slightly whenever she took a step. I could see through her eyes that she was walking...
1141211112111.title: Into Yuna´s brain

11422212.content:
The city of Luca. Without a doubt, the biggest city in Spira. People come from miles around just to see Yuna perform. Yuna has become a popular singer/dancer. Yuna is also a sphere hunter. Along with Rikku and Paine, Yuna hunts for spheres. They call themsleves the "YRP"
My name is Sith and I've long since known YRP. I'm also a sphere hunter. I have collected some pretty off-beat sphere. The latest sphere that I've gotten is largely unknown. Not even I know how it works. I've tried using it, but it doesn't work with me. I decided to give the useless sphere to YRP. Little did I knew, that sphere wasn't useless at all.
I was at Luca stadium, which doubled as a concert hall and a blitzball stadium. Tonight, Yuna was performing. Or at least a person who looked like Yuna. I was probably the only one who knew that the person on the stage wasn't Yuna at all. I can sense people, and that wasn't Yuna I was sensing. It was LeBlanc, leader of the LeBlanc Syndicate. She must've stolen Yuna's dresssphere somehow. Suddenly, I saw Rikku in the auidence. I smiled. Rikku was here...so the REAL Yuna must be here somewhere. Rikku was watching the concert through what looked like opera glasses. She was tapping her foot to the music.

"How about exploring Rikku´s body?" I proposed.
"I mean, what else could we do now?"

"And what about Rikku?" Shinra asked.
"I feel sorry for her." I said.
"But there´s nothing we could do for her right now."
"And where will we start our voyage?" Yuna asked.
"Hm...I´d say we explore her digestive organs first. So, we start in the stomach and follow her digestion until we reach her large intestines. Then we could go into her bloodstream, for example."
"Sounds like fun. Brother, let´s go!"
Brother began to maneuvre the airship through the huge stomach. He had no problem with avoiding the acids, but it was tough to find the entrance to the intestines, since Rikku´s stomach was so big that we couldn´t see from one side to another.
There was one thing I especially liked: on our way, we could hear Rikku breathing and we could also hear her heartbeat. I don´t know, but I think it´s fascinating.

I also saw Tifa in my mind. I saw her as clearly as if she were real. One thing was for sure: that Seproth would pay for his deeds.

11422212112121112111211111.content:
Meanwhile, we finally reached Rikku´s brain. The airship landed carefully on the grey ground.
"Brother, Shinra, wait here. Yuna, Paine, you´ll come with me."
We left the ship and hopped onto the ground. It was really an amazing sight: grey matter all around us, and strange tubes, probably Rikku´s nerves.
"Well then, let´s look for those evil-doers. I know they´re here."
Suddenly, someone appeared behind me.
"Long time no see, Sith."
"What the---?!"
Now that was a surprise: Cloud Strife!
"Cloud, what are you doing here?!"
"Don´t you remember? I, too, have been sucked into other stories. Well, and now I´m here to help you."
"How did you find me?"
"Well, I just saw that gigantic cute girl, and I knew immediately that you were inside her. Looks like I was right. Must be your fate, huh? Living inside sexy girl´s bodies."
"Aw, shut up. Say...do you know what happened to Tifa? And of course Lucia and Drez?"
"No idea. But that Seproth might know. Let´s find him."
"Yeah. Oh, I forgot. Cloud, these are Paine and Yuna, sphere hunters."
"Pleased to meet you, ladies."
After that wonderful dialogue, we immediately saw Barubary and the minions Seproth sended to us.

114222121121211121112111111.content:
"So, you must be the ugly demon who makes Rikku eating buildings."
"You arrogant scum." Barubary was visibly pissed.
"I shall show you my powers! And master Seproth will be pleased! I´ll show you a world of pain and suffering!"
"You´ll try!"
Cloud and me started to attack the other minions first. They looked like some bacteria, and they were no big deal. Now, only Barubary was left. He tried to cast some spells, but they didn´t hit us, as he was too slow.
"Oh, you filthy little..."
Then Yuna hit the monster with some painful shots, and Paine cut off his right leg.
"Arghh!"
Cloud and I finished off the demon. Cloud cut him into the belly with his buster sword, and I cut off his head with my...you know what, this Jedi weapon.
"So much for that guy."
The corpse disappeared, and we removed the chords that were forcing Rikku into eating.
"Huh...what happened? The candy disappeared!" we could hear Rikku saying.
"Should we talk to her?"

"Nah, she would worry too much."

That was when we were suddenly surrounded by more of Sproth´s minions (some of them looked like Grievous´ Magna Droids from Episode III; the ones with the energy-staffs).
"You will come with us." one of them said.
Yuna wanted to attack them, but I held her back.
"No, it´s useless. There´s too many of them."
They casted a spell and we were immediately brought into Rikku´s stomach, where Seproth was waiting. He was sitting on his shabby throne, but he stood up when he saw us.
"Ah, Sith, our good-guy. And Cloud Strife, the wanna-be SOLDIER."
"Seproth...you´re shorter than I expected." Cloud said dryly.
"You scum. You did well so far, but now, you won´t have such luck."
"Seproth...you said I could meet Tifa, right?"
