1142221211212111211121111112121111121111.content:
Things were looking bad. Seproth broke my only arm that was still left, so I couldn´t fight him anymore. The beams Seproth released were hitting Yuna and the others, making them unable to fight. They also hit Rikku´s stomach walls, causing here to scream in pain.
But Lucia was still in full control of her powers. She took out her saber, ready to fight. But she knew that Seproth´s katana would be able to resist her lightsaber, like the energy staffs of the magna-droids.
"Your sword, please. We don´t want to make a mess in front of your friend there."
"You will pay this time, Seproth."
She walked over to me and put her hands on my broken arm. After a few seconds, it was healed.
"Lucia...thank you."
"Don´t mention it Sith. Come now, we have a job to do."
And the fight began. We both attacked Seproth (you get it...like Dooku vs. Anakin and Obi-Wan in Ep III). But Seproth was a powerful warrior, so he was able to dodge most of our attacks.
"My powers have doubled since we last met, Seproth."
"Good. Twice the pride, double the fall. I have been looking forward to this."
I had a hard time fighting Seproth since I could use only one arm, but Lucia´s presence helped me to compensate this.
As the beautifully choreographed swordfight went on (a fighter as good as Sephiroth and two Jedi...insane!), something unusual happend. Rikku´s stomach began to shake and rumble, causing Seproth to loose his balance.
"No one will hurt my friends in my tummy!"
It was Rikku! She knew we were inside her. We used that moment of confusion and took away Seproth´s katana.
Before I could talk to him, he ran away towards the entrance to Rikku´s throat.
"Seproth! You said that I could meet Tifa again in case I defeat you!"
"...Yes. Well then, take this materia here."
He threw it over to me.
"Use it, and it will take you to your girlfriend."
After these words, he disappeared through Rikku´s esophagus.
"Looks like he isn´t such a bad-guy after all." Lucia said.
"Sith, Yunie, are you alright?"
"Quite, Rikku." I replied.
1142221211212111211121111112121111121111.title: The good in Seproth?

1142221211212111211121111112121111121111.content:
Rikku began to giggle.
"In fact, I´m a bit embarrased. I mean, having my friends inside me..."
"He, you know, it was quite cool and funny. Anyway, how do you think we´ll be able to leave your body?"
Unnecessary question. Moments later, we were all lifted in the air and thrown up into Rikku´s slimy esophagus. And woosh, we were outside, on Rikku´s hand.
"Hihi. Good to see you again."
"Wow, you certainly are huge, Rikku." Yuna said, still impressed.
"Personally, I´m glad to be in the outside world again." I said.
"But how do we get you normal again, Rikku?"
Again, that question was unnecessary. Rikku began to shrink down to normal size again.
"Yeah! I´m normal again!"
Rikku was visibly overjoyed, hugging and kissing me.
"Sith, Yunie, thank you so much!"
"Well, I guess it was Seproth´s doing."
"Yeah. Looks like he´s somehow a good guy. But why does he have to act like that all the time? Shrinking me and putting me into the bellies of girls..."
"Oh, Sith, your arm..."
"Yeah, lost it."
"I´ll build you a robotic arm."
"Really? Thanks, Rikku. You´re not only a good thief, but also a great inventor."
Well, and after a few hours, Rikku completed my new arm. You might know already, it looked like Anakin´s mech-arm in Episode III. Several days later, Lucia and me said good-bye to Rikku, Yuna and the others. Even though I like Rikku a lot, we wanted to return to our world. And I wanted to see Tifa again.
"Good bye, Sith, Lucia! Thanks for everything! And take good care of you!" Rikku said.
"Good bye, you two." Yuna added.
"Good bye, Rikku and Yuna." Lucia replied.
"Farewell, Rikku and Yuna. You´re good friends. I´ll miss you."
After that, I activated Seproth´s materia, and we both were sucked into a glowing light, that brought us directly to Nibelheim.
"We´re home." Lucia said.
"Ah, there you are!" a familiar voice said.
"Oh, Drez, it´s you again. You wanna come with us to Tifa?"
"Sure. She´s a gorgeous gal, so why not."
"Sorry, you two go first. I have to take care of something first." Lucia said.
"Ok, see you later."
She went away, and we headed for Tifa´s house. Finally, I would meet her again.
(you can find the continuation in chapter 6: "The sequel to the other Tifa-GTS story". It begins where this storyline ended!)

123211.content:
(This story is very similiar to my other Hitomi story, just growth this time)
Zack Island. What a wonderful place to be in. Even more wonderful when you consider that the girl you adore is also there: Hitomi, famous DoA fighter. You wanted to attract her attention, and you managed to make friends with.
Someday, you wanted to give her a present, so you went to the gift shop and bought a strange potion.
"This will bring you nearer to Hitomi than you ever imagined." the shop owner said.
So you bought it and brought it to Hitomi who was laying at the beach.
"Uh, Hitomi?"
"Oh, hi there! Say, I´m quite thirsty now, might I take a gulp from the bottle you´re holding there?"
"Uh, sure!"
So Hitomi drank the potion in one gulp.
"Mmh, much better now."
But then, she held her hand on her stomach.
"Ouch, something doesn´t feel right..."
"Hitomi?"
Then, this incredibly cute girl began to grow incredibly fast! You ran away as fast as you could, and you were able to see that her feet were now even as big as the island itself! (it´s not such a huge island, anyway) Hitomi was visibly confused and began to walk away from the island, through the water of the ocean. After you recovered from your shock, you decided to follow her. And you knew how: you saw a speedboat which you would take to follow the giantess.

You´re were shocked as Hitomi stopped growing. She was now about 1000 feet tall! The speedboat you were still in was now even smaller than one of Hitomi´s nails. Hitomi now could barely see you, but she was still able to hear you (it´s a fantasy-story, after all).

"Hitomi! That 'toy-boat' was probably a REAL boat!" you shout.

The 'toy-boat' is actually a full-size oceanliner. In fact, it looks a bit like the Titanic. The stomach acid is melting the oceanliner, but at a slower pace than the speedboat. you´re able to stay in her mouth for a while

Uh oh! That´s what you call a "worst case scenario"! You thought the box could save you, but you have to realize that you´re now on a hamburger! And you know what that means: Hitomi will certainly eat the hamburger, and you too! You try to get off the damn hamburger, but it´s already too late. Hitomi picks the burger, her meal while watching TV, and she´s completely unaware of the small passenger. She´s holding the burger right in front of her gorgeous face, and you forget about your grave situation for a moment.
"What a beautiful face! So cute, and so natural. She doesn´t even use make-up! Oh, Hitomi, I love you!"
Well, you can call that meaningless chit-chat, as Hitomi is bringing the burger nearer to her gigantic yawning mouth. What´s gonna happen?
12322112111.title: The yawning cave

123221121111.content:
Hitomi's open mouth gets closer and closer. You know there's no escape. Even if you get off the hsmburger in time, it's a long drop to the bed...and you're not sure you'll survive that. The hamburger enters Hitomi's mouth and you are bathed in darkness and Hitomi starts to chew. You manage to avoid being chewed to death, but you can't avoid what's coming next. Hitomi swallows you and the bits of hamburger. The trip down Hitomi's slick throat doesn't take long. You are forced through a tiny whole which exits in a big chamber. You fall with a splash in Hitomi's stomach. This is it...you're gonna be digested. You close your eyes and wait.
And wait.
And Wait.
Huh?
You open your eyes to find that you're alive. How can this be? Must've been that potion you drank. Well, you're happy you're not gonna get digested, but what now?

You´re still a bit confused about the events: first you were swallowed alive by the girl you love, and now you realize that you´re immune to stomach acids. But why? How can this be? Then you get the idea.
"The potion! That must be the doing of the potion!"
Damn, the guy who gave you the potion was right. You were indeed nearer to Hitomi than you ever imagined.
According to your situation, you look around. The stomach walls are pink and pulsating, releasing still more acids. You walk towards the stomach entrance, her throat, and see that there are more chewed pieces of hamburger are falling down into Hitomi´s stomach. So you won´t be able to leave her body right now, but what are you going to do? Staying in there doesn´t sound too exciting, but you would like to explore your love interest´s insides. You decide that you´ll start with her intestines. Walking over the moving, slimy ground of Hitomi´s stomach isn´t easy, but you reach the hole that leads into her intestines quickly.

But you can now even see some of Hitomi´s cells!
Anyway, the situation is now even more dangerous. You´re not only trapped inside of your girlfriend, but there also seems to be a chance of getting out of her body without getting hurt. With your height, you wouldn´t survive outside her body for a second.
Meanwhile, outside of her body, Hitomi was rubbing her stomach.
"Boy, that tasted great!"
She was getting tired, so she decided to go to bed for a a while. But for a second, she held her hand on her belly. She knew that something wasn´t right, but she had no idea that a tiny man was struggling to survive inside her.

So you start climbing. You grab the flesh of Hitomi´s throat in order to climb. It´s wet and slippery, so you could easily fall down again, but you don´t care. It´s your fight for survival. If you fight, you fight to win, you think, so you´ll reach her goddamn mouth (sorry, Hitomi!).
It´s an ordeal. As mentioned earlier, the slippery walls are difficult to climb and what´s even more dangerous: salvia is flowing down Hitomi´s throat every minute, which could easily make you fall down. And of course her throat muscles are also moving all the time, but you get over that.
You went halway up the throat now, when some salvia is again coming down. You grab ahold of Hitomi´s throat flesh, as tight as you can, in order not to fall down, and you succeed. But tears are coming down your cheek. You´re trembling, and you´re breathing heavily.

Yet it´s still not that easy, since the throat muscles are always moving, but that´s no big deal. After a few minutes (it still took you quite some time since you´re almost ant-sized), you´re able to see the mouth area. Unfortunately, luck is not on your side. Just as you enter Hitomi´s mouth area, she opens her mouth wide. First you think it´s your ticket to the outside world, but Hitomi breathes in air. You´re hit by the strong wind and you´re not able to resist: Hitomi breathes you in along with the air. You´re moved down her throat again, but this time not down her esophagus, but into her windpipe! Soon, you land inside a huge "bag" that´s pulsating all the time: her lungs.

Her coughing causes you to fall down onto the grey and soft ground, but you´re then lifted up again by her breathing. You must get outta here!

it takes you to her brain

It´s really not an amusing situation. Hitomi´s breathing is simply too strong for you: every time she breathes out you´re lifted up, and every time she breathes in you´re moved down by the air. But you somehow manage to wriggle yourself through the air and you can hold onto the grey mass of Hitomi´s lungs; the walls. You can tell that she´s no longer laying in her bed, but walking somewhere; looks like she gave up trying to sleep (not a surprise, considering she has a tiny man inside her system).
You decide that you have to get outta here; and this time you have luck: you realize that you can wriggle yourself through the walls of her lung into her bloodstream. choices: you tell her your story, she helps you and you get out

1232211211112222.content:
Your run through Hitomi´s body is too much for you to bear. Somewhere in her bloodstream, you fall unconscious due to the insane speed of its contents, with no idea where this voyage will end.
After what seems like hours, you wake up again. You feel that you are sitting on a grey and slimy ground. You stand up and look around, and everywhere is that grey mass with strange, tiny tubes in them, glistening from time to time. You immediately realize that you have landed in Hitomi´s brain. The tubes you noticed must be transporting various data from one part of her brain to another. In front of you, you can see something even more fantastic: Hitomi´s eyes, and you can actually watch the outside world through them! That´s really incredible, watching the world through the eyes of a gorgeous woman.
You take a look, but there´s nothing really exciting. You see how Hitomi´s sitting on a chair with a mirror in front of it, wich allows you to see her in all her beauty. Right now, she´s putting on some make-up (but not that much, only a little bit), putting on a pink lipstick and then painting her fingernails with transparent, glossy nail polish. Woman like things.
After a few minutes of watching her, you begin to say something.
"Hitomi...you´re so gorgeous. But...I don´t think I´ll ever be able to tell you how much I love you, since I´m going to die in here."
You carefully put your hands on the flesh of her brain and start to sob, when something unexpected happens.
"Who said that? Who´s there?"
Hitomi heard you! Now you can tell her everything, and maybe she´ll help you.
"Hitomi, do you hear me?"
"Yes, I do. Who are you, and WHERE are you?"
"Hitomi, it´s really a strange, story, but please, listen!"
"Wait...your voice...I know you! I talked with you on the beach! You were quite nice."
"Thanks. I can´t believe someone as beautiful as you remembers someone like me."
"Well, where are you?"
"You´ll probably won´t believe me, but...right now, I´m inside your brain."
"...What?"
"I told you it´s strange, but it´s like that. I guess I better tell you how that happened."
1232211211112222.title: Noticed

choices: tickle a part of her brain
12322112111122221.content:
"Okay, tell me what happened."
You slowly breathe in before you start telling your incredible story. Your only hope is that Hitomi believes all this.
"Well, it started when I drank a strange potion someone sold me. I had no idea what it was for, but when I went to your room in order to meet you, I began to shrink down in front of your door. You opened the door, but of course you couldn´t see me."
"Oh...that was you who knocked on the door? That explains a lot."
"Then I ran into your room and jumped into a small box in order to hide, but unfortunately, there was a hamburger inside it. And before I knew, you ate me along with it."
"Oh my...I ate someone alive...I´m so sorry, I..."
"Never mind. Well, in order to leave your body, I wanted to climb your throat, but instead of escaping, you breathed me in."
"So YOU made me cough when I wanted to sleep."
"Yeah. I...I´m sorry."
"Hihi. Never mind."
"Well, after having arrived in your bloodstream, I traveled through your body until arrived here, inside your brain."
"Wow..."
"Do you believe my story?"
"Yes. I know you are a person I can trust. You don´t sound like you´re telling crap."
"Thank, Hitomi."
"It´s just so strange. There´s actually a person inside me, and I didn´t even notice. I´m a bit embarrassed."
"You don´t have to."
"Thank you. But aren´t you angry with me? I mean, it´s all my fault, I ate you and..."
"That´s not your fault. How could you have known there´s a tiny passenger on your hamburger. And besides, being within such a wonderful girl like you is indeed an honor."
You can see through Hitomi´s eyes and in the mirror that she´s reddening, making you smile.
"But how are we supposed to get you out of me?"
"Hm..."
"Wait...I´ve got an idea!"
"Yeah?"
"Since you´re in my brain, I could simply sneeze you out."
"Yes, that´s possible."
"But...it could be disgusting, since..."
"Yes, I know, but that doesn´t matter. Just be sure that you hold your hand in front of your nose so I don´t get hurt."
"Of course. Now, I´ll just have to sneeze. But how?"
You look around and see a dangling chord. You now get an idea.
"Hitomi, I could tickle a certain part of your brain, causing a sneeze-reaction. Or you could just use a feather and tickle your nose."
12322112111122221.title: How to get out

123221121111222211.content:
"From what I´ve learned in school, this small part of your brain should control the sneeze reflex."
It´s in fact a slimy, dangling, grey chord, and god knows how you know that it´s this part.
"Well, then you should try it."

You begin tickling this disgusting fleshy mass, and it seems that your plan´s working. Hitomi immediately has to sneeze.

You can´t quite realize what happens now. It´s just too fast. Within only a few seconds, you find yourself in the palm of Hitomi´s hand, covered in something you don´t even want to know where it is from. You look up and see that gorgeous giantess staring at you, like a child.

"Sheesh...Of course I´m going to help you!"
"Really?!"
"Yep. After all, you´re my new friend."
"!"
"Of course, only if you want."
"Y-yes, I do!"
"Well, then. Best friends forever!" she says with a cute smile. Your stay in her body might have been exhausting, but it was worth the effort. You have befriended with Hitomi, the girl you love.
"So...I guess you wanna take a nap, huh? Exploring my body must have been exhausting. Or do you want to eat something? I have some sweets, if you want."

1511.content:
In her castle Princess Peach was looking out the Window. She was looking at the scenery outside the castle. She felt bored she wasn't allowed to leave the castle because Bowser was reported to be planning an attack on the Mushroom Kingdom.

She decided to look through her closet out of boredom. She saw a large box on the shelf inside the closet. Unfortunately she was too short to reach it even when she stood on her toes.

Standing on her toes while wearing heels caused her to trip and bump her head on the shelf which caused her to knock down a mushroom from above. When she got back up she saw the mushroom on the floor next to her.

She never seen a mushroom of that particular color before. She thought maybe it tasted horrible but reluctantly took a bite. I didn't seem to effect her in anyway. When she got off the floor she again hit her head on shelf but this time she was still kneeling on the floor.

When came out of the closet she also hit her head on the ceiling forcing her to stand on her knees. She quickly noticed that she somehow had grown.
1511.title: Strange Mushroom

choices: Mario´s running away from the gigantic, walking Peach
15111.content:
Princess Peach realized in horror that it was not over yet. She was still growing! After a few seconds she became so big that her bedroom burst. The various toads doing their work in the castle saw what was going on and were trying to help Peach, but of course, they couldn´t. They ran away as Peach now grew out of the castle roof. She was looking at her surroundings and saw her destroyed castle she was standing in. She barely saw the toads running around her heels, they looked like ants. Suddenly, the growth stopped. Just then, Mario, our beloved hero, who has been fighting Bowser again, was walking by. Originally he wanted to visit Peach, but then he saw the gigantic Peach standing at the place where the castle once stood.
"Mamma mia!" Mario shouted. The leader of the toads (the toad we all know) was running towards Mario and explained what happened. Mario quickly ran in front of Peach´s feet and tried to get her attention, but she was looking into a different direction and didn´t notice him. Unfortunately, Peach began to walk, and a huge foot was about to stomp on Mario, but he avoided getting hit by jumping away.

151112111.title: A bit TOO close to the Princess...

choices: Mario tries to climb back out.
Mario tries to make Peach vomit.
151112112.content:
Mario slid down the slimy trail of her throat at racing speed. Huge drops of saliva splashed against his face on the way down the pitch dark tunnel. He wasn't even sure if he could believe what was happening. One moment he was hanging on to her giant lip, outside with a cool wind blowing on him. Now he was sliding down to his doom, moving so fast he couldn't even think. He was heading right for her stomach when he suddenly found himself stuck inside a small pocket in the back of her throat. The pocket led a little deeper into the throat, but he didn't dare go look for himself. His clothes were thoroughly drenched with saliva. He tried feeling his way through the thick darkness, but everywhere felt the same. Hot, slick, and slimy.

Mario looked down below him and could just make out the entrance to Peach's stomach. Strange yellow fluids swished throughout and a foul odor from the stomach wafted up towards him. He wiped the sweat and the saliva from his forehead and thought about what to do. He was trapped in an infinitely black pit with seemingly no hope of ever getting out. He had to do something, though.

Now and then, the fluids from the stomach would rise up the throat slightly. Every time they did, Mario thought Peach was about to vomit. But after a few moments, they subsided and returned to the stomach, but that gave him an idea. He thought about the situation and narrowed his escape to two options. He could try to climb up the throat, which he didn't think was possible seeing how slimy it was. Or, he could try to make Peach puke him out. He thought about how big Peach was compared to him and the distance from her mouth to the ground. He was frightened by these being his only two options, but they were his only way out.
151112112.title: Mario gets stuck in her throat

choices: Mario enters Peach´s body through her mouth
1511122.content:
"Mario?!"
Peach could barely see the bug-sized Mario that was hanging on her lower lip. She picked him so he could sit on her titanic hand.
"What happened, Mario?"
Mario explained her all the details in a nutshell. Peach now knew what was going on, but she still had no idea how to solve her height problem.
"Maybe we should ask a toad-doctor?"
Said and done. After a few minutes the toad doctor from the destroyed castle arrived and tried to find out how to help peach. And he quickly found out what happened.
"Well, it appears that our princess has this, uhm, height problem because of that mushroom she ate. Unfortunately, she already digested the mushroom, and her body absorbed its parts that are responsible for the growth. The only way to help the princess would be this brilliant plan: someone must get into the princess´ body and destroy the parts of the mushroom I mentioned. They are inside her stomach, her lungs, her heart and her brain. Once all the parts are destroyed, our volunteer must get out of her body quickly, before she grows to normal again. He can get out with this warp-flute. Well, and I guess our volunteer will be...Mario!"
Mario quickly nodded. Of course he would do everything to save Peach.
"But you are still not small enough. If you want to enter her bloodstream, then you must become a bit more small. Luigi!"
Suddenly, Luigi arrived with a hammer. He hit Mario with that hammer on the head, making him even smaller.
"That will do."

15111221.content:
Mario hopped up and down to be sure his jumping skills were not hindered by the sudden bonk. Seeing that all was well, he turned to the doctor.

"Ah, very good." The doctor looked over to Peach. "Princess, if you would be so kind...?"

"...Oh!" The princess realized his meaning. "Well, I mean...I am not entirely comfortable with..." Her voice faded to mutters of uncertainty.

"Ah. Luckily, there is a quicker method." The doctor pulled a yellow block bearing a tornado-like image from his coat. "Now simply hit this block."

"Like this?" Peach lightly jabbed the cube with her fingernail. Before anything could be said, the surprised giantess began inhaling with incredible force, a loud WOOSHing noise filling the room. After the chaos had ended, Peach fell on her side, feeling dizzy.

"Oh...umn...wha?" The princess looked around. "Mario...?"

"Ah, a success." The doctor smiled. "I will have to thank Brirock for letting me borrow that..."*

"This isn't going to cut it" remarked one of the Toad Gaurds "What about Mario and Luigi ,With muscles like their's your head should pop right out".
With that the Toad zoomed away in search of the two Brightly Colored Plumbers. The Toads found them in the-
151122.title: The toad comes back with more Toads.

1511222.content:
The toad came back with Mario And Luigi, the two of them baffled by what they had been told. However, they agreed to help. Once they entered Peach's room the duo gazed in awe at what had happened to the prinncess. The to spoke nonscensical gibberish to eachother as always with the odd jump or hand gesture. The Toads just figure that they were planning on what to do.

Both Mario and Luigi grabbed her left foot and yanked with as much might as the pair could muster up. With a bizzare popping noise Peach's head slid out.However, there was still the matter of the Princess being huge, so the Mario bros started to ponder.

Deep in thought the Mario duo stood, silent as though they were alone in the room. The Toads watched in anticipation to what creative idea the Mario bros came up with, after a while Mario said somthing to Luigi, who nodded agreeably.
"What's that you say, get it out from inside her" Interuppted a Toad Gaurd
Mario nodded an sign of agreement to the Toad who looked back shuddering all over.

"Are you positive that's the only way?"
Spoke another Toad
Luigi mumbled a bunch of gibberish which was made out by the Toads to be a "Yes" in a manner of speaking.

True it was a strange thought allthough it seemed mildy sound so to say. Allthough it was a tad risky one had to stay outside to hang on to a rope unless they were really considering freestyling, which seemed insane even by their standards.

Howvever, it was unanimus, Mario would be going alone, Luigi still hadn't full recovered from the time he and Mario were inside Bowser. So the Toads from as if out of nowhere handed the two some rope, Mario thought it only fair that they leave who was going in to chance, he still remembered their little expeiriedce in Bowser and thought a friendly game of Rock, Paper, Scisors could be his ticket to a nice afternoon in bed rather than in the shower washing off Peach's bodily juices.

But alas Mario had lost. Mario tried to convince everone that this was a bad idea, despite the fact that it was his idea in then first place. Luigi had finished strapping the rope around Mario's waist smirking the whole time.

Peach hoisted Mario off of the ground with her thumb and forefinger and brought him level to her face, Mario let out a small yelp as the Princess's lips parted before him. Just before he was popped into her mouth he could have sworn he saw Luigi wiping his forhead as though he'd escaped a terrible accusment of some sort.

Mario whimpered a little as he felt his ankles being pulled downwards with a little effort Mario's entire waist was pulled into Peach's throat.

Outside Luigi was calmly lowering Mario in paying no attention to Mario's cries for help.

Soon after his waist was pulled in, his chest was pulled along with it. He could feel the muscles having there way with him, pulling him down to her awaiting stomach.
When Mario could feel his legs kicking he knew he was about ready to enter her stomach. Whith a slashing sound Mario fell flat on his face.

Out of nowhere a light gleemed upon his skin; a sort of reddish color. He cautously walked over to it.
1511222.title: Hallway - coming to see Peach

And so the story begins at Laharl's castle.

155211111.title: Another day at the castle

155211112.content: Yeah, I´d much rather take Etna, Laharl´s loyal vassal.
155211112.title: Etna

choices: Inside Etna´s food that she is about to eat!
On the floor, with Etna´s gigantic shoe coming nearer!
1552111121.content:
During the night in the Netherworld, its ruler, the great, magnificent Overlord Laharl, son of King Krichevskoy, was lurking through the hallways of his castle. He smiled with a satisfied expression.
"Ha, ha, ha! Overlord, Overlord, Overlord!"
He was still overjoyed about the fact that he was now the ruler of the Netherworld. He defeated all his opponents, so he became the rightful owner of the thrown. Suddenly, he heard a strange voice.
"Hello, my king. Can´t sleep?"
"Who´s there?"
Then the mysterious figure walked towards him. Laharl could now see who he was.
"Maderas?! What are you doing here?"
"He, he, he. I am not Maderas. I am his older, superior brother. And I . . . want to get rid of you!"
"Ha! Just try! I am the strongest demon in all the Netherworld! Attack me, and you´ll regret it!"
"He, he, he! Your majesty, you get me wrong. I won´t attack you. I´ll get rid of you in a more...subtle way."
He pointed his hand towards Laharl and spoke some magical words. And suddenly, Laharl began to shrink!
"Wh...what the?!"
"Ha, ha, ha! Now, you won´t be able to fight against me. I´ll just have to finish you."
Then, a voice could be heard.
"Oh King! Where are you?" It was Etna´s voice.
"Oh, how convenient! I have a great idea, my king! You will be destroyed by your own vassal!"
"What are you planning to do, Mader... whoever you are?"
"You´ll see!"
Just then, everything around Laharl turned dark, he was getting unconscious.
As he woke up again, he found himself...
1552111121.title: The evil shrinking plan

choices: It´s no use, Laharl is landing in Etna´s stomach
Laharl manages to attack her uvula, causing Etna to choke
15521111211.content:
Laharl slowly opened his eyes again. It was no longer dark, so he could see his surroundings.
"What kind of place is that?"
He looked around and saw huge lumps of a flesh like thing. As he stood up, he noticed that he was standing in a strange liquid.
"Oh, yeah. I know what this is. This is Etna´s favourite snack. Zombie-steak with sauce. But why on earth is everything so big? What on earth happened? Hm...Ah, now I remember. That Maderas-brother jerk casted a spell on me, I shrunk, and then he said something about Etna destroying me. What a moron!"
Just then he realized something.
"Wait! I shrunk, Etna´s supposed to kill me unwittingly, and now I´m in her favourite food? That means...I´ll have to get outta here! The hell out!"
But it was too late. As he tried to reach the walls of the bowl he and the food were in, he saw a gigantic face above: Etna´s face!
"Well, since Laharl didn´t show up for some reason, I´m gonna eat all by myself."
"Damn! Etna, stop! It´s an order made by your master! Don´t eat me! Et...!"
It was no use. She couldn´t hear him. He was spooned up with some of the smaller lumps by Etna, and she brought the spoon near her yawning mouth. He could see an enormous, pink cave, her mouth, coming nearer and nearer. The spoon was passing her teeth, and after a few seconds he fell on her wet, fleshy tongue. He looked around and realized how small he truly was. A tooth of Etna was house-sized compared to him, or even bigger. Her mouth was still open, so he ran towards her teeth and tried to climb out of her mouth, only to see Etna drinking something. He couldn´t resist the masses of water, and he was about to be washed down Etna´s throat.
"Damn! This can´t be! But..."
He noticed that he was passing the uvula, so got an idea. He had to attack her uvula quickly in order to avoid getting swallowed.
15521111211.title: Etna´s mouth

choices: Laharl decides to travel through Etna´s body for some reason
Laharl uses "Overlord´s wrath" on Etna´s stomach (that´s gonna hurt!)
155211112111.content:
It was no use. There was not enough time left for Laharl to start an attack on Etna´s uvula. The masses of water washed him into a huge, pink tube: Etna´s throat.
"Ahrgh, noooo!"
All he could see during his lang fall down Etna´s throat were pink, fleshy walls, and he got sick of that sight quickly. His fall lasted for what seemed like forever. Finally, he could see a hole, and seconds later he was sucked into it. Of course he knew what it was: that hole lead into Etna´s stomach. Laharl landed in a pool of water and chewed zombie-flesh. He realized immediately that the rising digestive juices were no threat to him. After all, he was the Overlord, so stomach acids were not a problem. He looked around in that pink, wet cave, and he could barely see the other side of her stomach. Her stomach walls were pulsating and somehow scary.
"Sheesh! Why is it that I don´t have any luck with vassals?! Either they let me down or they swallow me whole! Alright. What am I supposed to do now..."
155211112111.title: Inside a vassal´s stomach

choices: Laharl enters Etna´s bloodstream through her intestines
1552111121111.content:
Laharl knew exactly that there was only one possibility of getting out of Etna´s body: he had to make contact with her. Then they both might be able to think of something.
"Hm. I guess I´ll have to go into her brain. From there I should be able to talk with her. So, in order to get there, I should enter her bloodstream. I hope it´ll take me into her brain."
After all, Laharl was small enough to enter Etna´s bloodstream. But...would it really take him to his destination?
"Too late to worry about details. And...I haven´t much choice, do I?"
So Laharl began to walk through Etna´s stomach towards her small intestines. There he would make a cut into her intestines´ walls in order to enter her bloodstream. But the way through her stomach was loooong. Since he was almost about the size of a germ, it was no surprise, though.
During the walk, he looked around and saw some interesting things.
"Hm, what have we here? An earring...a dagger...some pages from a magical book...If I ever get outta here, then I should talk with her about her eating habits."
Finally, our magnificent Overlord reached the hole that lead into her small intestines. Suddenly, he felt that Etna began to move. She must have stopped eating. And more surprisingly, he heard a voice.
"Mwahaha! I see, you survived so far. Impressive, king!"
"Mader...whoever!"
He saw a holographic image of Maderas´ brother standing behind him.
"Anyway, I don´t think you´ll ever get out of here. You´ll be lost inside her body forever! And I shall become the new Overlord! Mwahaha!"
"We´ll see, moron!"
The image then disappeared.
"I´ll have to hurry. I must get out of here quickly."
1552111121111.title: Journey through the stomach

15521111211111.content:
"Ugh...disgusting!" Laharl said as he entered the hole into Etna´s intestines. Green liquids, probably acids, were all around him, and the walls around him were pulsating, trying to move him through the intestines.
"Hm...looks like I´ll make a cut...right there!"
He took his sword and made a cut in the fleshy wall of Etna´s intestines.
"Ouch!" he could hear Etna scream. He smiled.
"Sorry, Etna, my vassal. Well, to the brain, then."
15521111211111.title: Into the intestines

155211112111111.content:
Laharl the magnificent bravely jumped into the hole, and seconds later he was being pushed through a red liquid, Etna´s blood.
"Ha, Ha, Ha! Maderas...eh, whoever, prepare! Once I get back to normal, you´ll pay!"
Her bloodstream transported him through her body for quite some time, until something told him that he was near brain. While he was still floating throufg the blood, he took his sword and made another cut into the walls of Etna´s veins. Et voilá, he was able to get through. The next thing he saw were monstrous masses of grey matter. Yes, he has reached Etna´s brain.
"No one can stop me, the allmighty Overlord of the Netherworld! Mwahahaha!"
He looked around a bit and saw tubes that transported various data and information to various parts of her brain. Then he reached two enormous, window-like holes, Etna´s eyes. From there he could see what she was doing right now.
155211112111111.title: Into the brain at last

choices: Now to lug the giant corpse to the Hospital.
1552111121112.content:
Size meant nothing to Laharl's supernatural abilities. For a moment, he questioned the ethics of blowing a hole in his second-in-command's body, but then he recalled that the Hospital had repaired worse. With a deep breath and a battle-cry, he lobbed a barrage of explosive orbs into the soft, wet flesh of her stomach, converting it to charred, crumbling flesh.
Etna may not be pleased, but she DID always pressure him to be more ruthless.

15522111.content:
(I used that storyline before in another interactive, but unfortunately, it didn´t work back then; missed the goal. Hope it works this time!)
One day, Lloyd was getting sick of the boredom in his home village of Iselia. So he left the village for a while in order to find some excitement. Well, and after quite some time, he found an interesting item in a nearby cave. It was a stone with strange carvings on it. Lloyd had no idea what this stone was for, but he was curious. He went back to Iselia and wanted to show the item to his girlfriend Colette; he knocked on her door, and she opened it immediately.
"Hi, Lloyd!"
"Hi, Colette. Mind me coming inside?"
"Of course not! Come in!"
They went into the living room, where he saw a table with some food on it. Looks like Colette was eating.
"Well, what brings you here, Lloyd?"
"I wanted to show you something. This stone."
He gave her the stone.
"Wow, it looks beautiful!"
"Yes, but..."
"Oops!"
Just typical. Colette dropped the stone, and it fell on the ground. Lloyd was covered in a strange light, and he was beginning to shrink down to 1/2 of an inch! Lloyd was slowly getting unconscious, but he could tell that Colette didn´t notice him, as he was so small.
"Lloyd! Where are you?!" Colette shouted.
Lloyd could feel that he fell onto soft ground, perhaps Colette´s food. Then he passed out.
15522111.title: Clumsy Colette

15522121.title: Story selection

155221211.content:
*Before anything this takes place after (spoiler)Lloyd learns Kratos is his father, and Kratos has rejoined the group(end spoiler) oh and Zelos is also in the group as well*

*Mizuho*
"You sure you want to go through with this, Sheena?" asked Lloyd with slight worry.

"I'm sure of it, Lloyd, Kochinawa stole Corrine's bell from me and almost kept us from curing Colette if it wasn't for me agreeing to fight him. He wants a fight I'm going to give him a fight." answered Sheena with a focus look in her brown eyes.

"Yeah I see what you mean, and don't worry I'll be with you and if anything happens I'll stop that ninja myself." Lloyd flashed Sheena a kind smile, which caused the summoner to blush a bit. "Thanks Lloyd."

As they approached the boat that would take them to their destination, they noticed Kratos waiting near said boat.

"Huh, Dad?" "Hello Lloyd, glad I could speak with you and Sheena before you left for this duel." answered Kratos.

"Kratos what is it that you have to speak to us about?" asked Sheena kindly. "Simple I know this duel will be tough on you Sheena, since you will be on your own and Lloyd is going only to be a watcher. I wanted to give something that may just help you."

"Oh really, well thank you Kratos. You really are a nice guy just like your son." said Sheena with a giggle as she pointed at Lloyd. The young swordsman merely blushed sightly at her words.

Kratos nodded and handed her the object he was holding just a second ago. "It's an exsphere?" asked Sheena.

"Yes its a supposed "powerful" exsphere apparently one of its kind, Mithos was having it developed but I relived him of it, secretly of course. All I know its that its multiplies your strength and stamina tenfold. Use it if you feel the need to."

"I see, thank you and I will use it if I feel the need." said Sheena as she bowed before Kratos.

Lloyd and Sheena waved to Kratos as they sailed down the small river toward the island that Kochinawa was awaiting them.

Soon they docked and Lloyd decided to ask Sheena a small question. "So are you going to start the fight using the exsphere my Dad gave you?"

"I don't know, yet. I can sense that Konchinawa is lot stronger than last time. I may just have to use it." stated Sheena.

"So you finally arrived, about time murderer." stated the ninja. Sheena and Lloyd glared at him as he spoke. "Well then Sheena lets get things started."

The ninja took a battle position and awaited Sheena's move. "Good luck Sheena and I'll be cheering for you." said Lloyd as he took a position to watch over the fight.

Sheena nodded at Lloyd and focused on Kochinawa. It was time to decide if she should use exsphere given to her by Kratos.
155221211.title: Kratos' Gift

"Have a safe trip!" said Raine, as she lifted the glass to her lips. Lloyd and Genis watched in awe as Raine's lips parted to reveal her cavernous mouth. The two pupils held on to each other as the water around them turned into a raging torrent as they were swept into Raine's mouth. Her top teeth flew by they entered her humid mouth. Despite the cool water, her mouth was very wet and warm. They floated over her huge tongue, which hung underwater like a giant pink whale. Soon they were brought to her throat, where her uvula stood like a guardian. They were sucked down her throat and into her esophagus, where they were pushed down by her strong throat muscles. They then landed with a splash in her stomach, followed by a waterfall of water.

"Where are we, Lloyd?" asked Genus.

"Looks like her stomach," replied Lloyd.

They looked up as a warm, soft light illuminated the cavern. "I see you two made it down all right," said Raine. Her voice seem detached, but they could hear her well. "Now I want you to...

155222222222111.content: The Icarian Feena, who else?
155222222222111.title: The obvious choice

1552222222221111.content:
Zil Padon (is that spelled right?) lay in ruins, all but the Mogay section had been reduced to statues, crumbling walls and massive root-like tentacles as Gaia battlers advanced on the single bridge that kept them from petrifying the few survivors.

"There's too many of them!" Rapp shouted, retreating as another seven battlers sprout from a single fallen one.
"We can't just give up, everyone's counting on us to protect them." Justin shout back as he was driven back by sheer numbers.
"We can't beat that thing, it just keeps regenerating!" Rapp yelled as another spray of green beams hit him. He barely managed to keep an upright position.
"Only an Icarian can oppose Gaia. Feena you must use your powers!" Leite pleaded before she was rendered unconscious.
"But I don't think I'm that strong..." Feena weakly muttered, shying away from the battlers.
"Feena..." Justin started, his sentence stopped when two battlers struck with Lighting and Combination Blows. He staggered forward and collapsed.
"Justin!" Feena fell to her knees in horror. "No... Justin... Please spirits, give me strength." She needed to be stronger, strong enough to protect everyone. Even with her wings emerged her body couldn't handle the power she called on. There was only one way. With each new surge of energy her body expanded. In a wash of power the Gaian battlers dissovled completely.
1552222222221111.title: An Icarian's power

choices: Feena and her friends rest for awhile

15522222222211112.content:
They were gone. The gaia battlers...vanished. Justin´s comrades were relieved, and yet they were also, well, surprised about this incredible power. But then, Rapp looked around and saw a gigantic foot in front of him. Feena´s foot.
"W-What the...?!"
He now realized how huge Feena was.
"THAT´s the power of the Icarians?!"
"Yes, Rapp." Liete answered calmly.
"JUSTIN! JUSTIN!" Feena shouted.
"Ugh, Feena?"
Justin stood up again, but he still felt dizzy.
"Feena, where are you?"
"Up there, Juss." Rapp pointed to the gigantic Icarian girl, known as Feena.
"WHAT?!"
Feena now grabbed Justin with her hand, and she held him in front of her face. Justin was still confused about the height of his girlfriend.
"Feena, what happened to you?"
"It seems that these are my Icarian powers."
"And you defeated all the gaia-battlers? Wow! Incredible!"
But of course, there were things left to be discussed. Can Feena grow back to normal again? Will her powers be useful again? You´ll decide!

155222222222221.title: Fina?

1552222222222211.content:
Fina.....You must stop Rami.....

"Elder?"

"Oh, Vyse! I think she's coming 'round"


Fina opened her eyes and saw two people looking down at her. One was a boy with an eye-patch with brown hair. The eye-patch had a clear lens in it. The boy was also wearing blue clothes. The girl had orange-red hair and had a yellow shirt on with a blue belt. Fina sat up in the bed.

"Who are you two?" asked Fina.

"I'm Vyse of the Blue Rogues" said the boy. "and this is Aika" Vyse gestured at the girl in yellow.

"What's your name?" asked Aika.

"F..Fina" said Fina. The last thing she remembered, she was on her ship being attacked by a flying ship.

"Fina...that's a funny name" said Aika.

"It's very nice" said Vyse.

"Where am I?" asked Fina.

"On The Albatross" said Aika. "you were being attacked by the Armanda"

"Armanda?" asked Fina.

"Vulan Armanda" said Vyse. "we Blue Rogues love to fight the Armanda"

"What's a 'Blue Rogue' ?" asked Fina.

Both Aika and Vyse explained what a Blue Rogue was, and what was the difference between a Blue Rogue and a Black Pirate.

"VYSE! come up here now!" yelled a voice from nowhere. Vyse sighed and left the room.

"Well...see you!" said Aika, leaving the room after Vyse.

What does Fina do?

1552222222222222111.content:
One day, you were visiting the race track of Ridge City. Not to see the race, but to watch the grid girl Reiko Nagase. You´ve been looking at her during the whole race, and someone noticed that.
"Hey, you."
"Huh?"
"You like the girl?"
"Well...yes, she´s pretty, you know."
"Hm. Then I have a present for you."
He took out a pill.
"Take this pill. It will help you get near the girl. Don´t worry, It´s not some kind of drug or threatening in anyway. Just take it, and you´ll thank me."
"Okay, I believe you."
You took the pill and threw it into your mouth.
"Gulp."
"Good bye, boy."
The man left, and a few moments later, you felt dizzy. And whoosh! You were starting to shrink down. Seconds later, you were just about the size an insignificant ant. And it´s just not your day: you saw the gigantic Reiko walking by, hundreds of metres high, directly walking toward you. Of course she wouldn´t see you, as you were just ant sized or even smaller. She must have been leaving the race track and going home.
You had to think of something fast; her right foot stepped directly in front of you. You realized that even her foot was now even bigger than a house compared to you.
Well, you decided to...
1552222222222222111.title: HUGE Reiko

Above her shoulder, you can see her dangling earlobe, and you decide to grab it. You jump with all you might, and you succeed in grabbing the dangling piece of flesh. But you´re now in a dangerous situation; you may be hanging safely on her earlobe, but if you´re unfortunate and fall down, this could be the end. Anyway, from her earlobe, you boldly jump into the small hole that leads into Reiko´s earcanal. Although it´s just a tiny hole, it seems like the entrance to a huge cave. You´re trying to take a look inside, but there´s only darkness, and honestly, you don´t want to know what´s in there.

you´re forced even deeper into her head

Obviously, Reiko noticed your jump into her ear, and you most likely gave her an itch. So she brings the pink-painted fingernail of her pointer finger to her ear, trying to get rid of the itch by scatching. You´re forced to run deeper into Reiko´s ear canal, since her fingernail is blocking the exit of her ear. You think you´re safe after you ran deeper into her head, but you are wrong. The scratching of Reiko´s fingernail causes the tunnel of her ear canal to shake, and you loose your balance. Unfortunately, she shifts her head, causing you to roll down deeper into Reiko´s skull.

Reiko puts the car into her pocket
1552222222222222112.content:
(Note: the reason for Reiko´s growth will not be explained here; maybe later. Perhapsy by you?)
It seemed to be another day in Ridge City. Another Race took place, and as usual Reiko was the grid girl (and she is sometimes better to watch than the race).
Anyway, this is just the beginning of your adventure with the giantess Reiko:
As Reiko wanted to leave the race track, she suddenly felt dizzy. She couldn´t explain why, maybe because she ate something wrong. But what happened now couldn´t be explained by something she ate: Reiko began to grow incredibly fast! Every person on the race track was able to see that and ran away, screaming in fear. After a few seconds, Reiko stopped to grow, and she was now about the height of a skyscraper.
As it was explained earlier, everyone else ran away, except for you. You were sitting in your car, driving through Ridge City, and you didn´t notice the giantess (only God knows why not). But you noticed when you hit her heels with the car. Fortunately, it was not a grave accident, as you were driving pretty slow. You looked out of the window of your car.
"What the---?!"
And unfortunately, the giantess Reiko, who didn´t seem to bother much about her new height, noticed the car.
"Now, what have we here?" she growled.
You were trying to get the hell outta your car, but to no avail. She was able to grab your car before you could get out. Now she was holding the car right in front of her face, and to her it was even smaller than a toy-car. Nevertheless, she didn´t seem to notice you. What would happen next?

155222222222222221.content: Who gets to grow?
155222222222222221.title: Zelda GTS

choices: She grows and destroys the castle
1552222222222222211.content:
Zelda was sitting about Hyrule Castle, bored of the peaceful times that had befallen the Kingdom. She thought over how little Hyrule had expanded in her lifetime. She wanted to see her kingdom's borders grow into a vast empire...And she wanted to be it's supreme ruler. She wanted badly to take the throne from her father, but there was no reason to. But she wanted to secure power.

After days of careful planning, she finally had a solution how. She'd heard many tales from Link about his adventures when he left Hyrule. One particular quest caught her attention. She immediately made arrangements.

"Milady," a guard said approaching her lounging couch in her peaceful rotunda. "There is a man here to see you. He claims that you sent for him and that he has a parcel for you."

Zelda perked out of her deep thoughts and immediately stood up. "Send him downstairs and tell him I will meet him shortly," she ordered.

"I would advise against that Madame," the guard said. "The man could be an assassin. We should immediately examine the package to make sure it is not dangerous."

"I can assure you; it is not," she said. "I did send for this man. The parcel he carries, I told him expressly to bring to me when he received it."

"My Princess, regardless; I cannot authorize a stranger allowed in the interior of the castle," the guard argued.

"That was an Order," Zelda snapped.

"...Yes your Highness," the Guard said, moving away in defeat.

--

The Princess was soon escorted down a dark stone staircase, led by a guard. The orange glow from the Guard's torch was the only light she had. They soon came to the bottom area. It almost looked like this place would lead to the dungeons or something far worse even. Standing at the other end waiting for them, was another guard and another man. The guard escorting Zelda used his torch to light the empty torches on the walls. Zelda smiled seeing the man there.

"Leave us," she ordered the guards. They nodded and marched up the staircase, leaving her alone with the stranger. The man had a bald head and wore sunglasses. He had a resemblance to the man who ran the Fishing Pond at Lake Hylia; from their clothes, down to their pot-bellies. He was even caught scratching himself from time to time. Under his right arm was a parcel wrapped in brown cloths and tied with string. "You have it...Good."

"Your majesty," the man said. "I am not comfortable about this."

"I offered you a fortune for that," Zelda said stepping forward.

"I know," the man said stepping back. "But you see...this particular item...Well it belonged to someone I know. That Green-Hat boy...he...he not only saved my best friend and helped us out of a jam...but he also saved our entire land from complete destruction. I feel bad about giving you this."

"But you didn't steal it...It came to you through the usual channels," Zelda said. "From what I've heard...when something in your town is stolen, it eventually finds its way to you...And then you sell it to whoever is willing to buy it."

"Yes...But it still belongs to him," the man said. "...I can't let you have this...for less than double."

Zelda smiled; the man was trying to negotiate with her. "Done," she said. "You can pick up the rupees shortly. Now hand it over!"

"Alright," the man said handing her the package. Zelda took it, earnestly. She untied the string and pulled the cloths back. "Yes...you did well," she told him. In her hands was a grey mask made from some sort of metal. It was a rather important mask. According to Link's stories, this was the Giants' Mask...It's powers were most intriguing. When needed, the mask allowed Link to grow to gigantic size and face the Monsters Twinmold in combat. And now, it was all hers.

--

She paid the man double what she offered him, just to make him leave. For days she studied the mask. It required the wearer to bear magical powers...There were few in Hyrule to rival her mastery of magic. But more confounding, it's powers seemed to be limited to the secret room where Twinmold was hiding. Zelda attributed this to the markings across the side of the Mask; an incantation binding the mask to the one room. But the magic was definitely inside...She just had to unleash it.

She brought the mask to the Royal Smith to have him melt the metal down. She suggested the designs on the mold would be Hylian Texts describing a new incantation. The smith took the order without question. He melted down the magical metal of the mask. Per Zelda's orders, the molds he crafted were to be of a medallion to be worn around the neck and two wrist bracelets to go with it. After days of waiting, the Smith delivered Zelda's new accessories to her.

The incantation read that she would be allowed to use it's powers anywhere she chose; all she need do was to wear all three of them at the same time. Smiling, Zelda readied herself for her quest of power. She slipped the bracelets on first. She could feel something inside was preparing to spring to life. She slowly put the necklace on.

The toads, Zits, Pimple, and Rash had foiled many of the dark queen's evil plans, first when she kidnapped Pimple and his girlfriend, Alicia, as well as the time when she went after the double dragon team, along with many other evil schemes that she came up with. Oh, one other thing is that although this is a GTS story, male characters can become giants as well, if you want them to, which could make things very interesting, especially if they go up against a giant dark queen. Anyways, choose your side.
15522222222222222221.title: Be a hero or villian

155222222222222222211.content:
About 3 years have passed since the toads have defeated the Dark Queen and during those years, nothing has been heard from her. She retreated from earth and built a base on Mars so that she can plan her next evil scheme against the battle toads and now she had finally come up with the most brilliant plan, she will make herself and her cronies grow to become giants, and by doing so they can launch their next coup de'tat in which she would beome the evil emperoress of this world and start a galactic empire. Will she succeed in her plans or will the battletoads triumph? Your choices will not only determine the fate of the battle toads, but the world as well. However, I will try to make the deaths of th battletoads as humorous as possible since their deaths were often humorous, though often frustrating in the game.
Note: Considering that the toads had been teamed up with the double dragon team in one of the previous installments, for those of you who add to this story line, feel free to add other video game heros (i.e., ninja turtles, power rangers, etc.)

Now, where are the battle toads anyways?
155222222222222222211.title: The evil Dark Queen is at it again

1552222222222222222111.content:
It is a lovely day on the beach along the coast of southern california, and the battle toads enjoying the day on the beach. They had come down to the beaches along the california to escape from their every day hassles in New York City (where they live of courses.) "Ah, the luxuries of life", Zitz says as he gulps down a strawberry dacquari while sitting along the beach and getting his green skin tanned. Pimple's girlfriend, Alicia got bored of living away from Pimple and so she decided to move back to earth and get married to Pimple despite the fact that she nearly lost her life long ago when the Dark Queen kidnapped her (along with Pimple) and threatened to have them both killed, while the other Toads Zits and Rash had put their lives on the line trying to rescue the duo despite all of the deadly obstacles, foes and other dangers they had to face when rescuing Alicia.
Pimple and Alicia are also on the beach, sitting and swimming with each other, and Rash is enjoying the aquatic life, swimming along the coast. Rash says to the others, "man, I miss those days when we had to go up against the evil dark queen, even though we nearly got killed in foiling her earlier schemes. I wonder what she is up to now?" Zitz says to Rash, "don't worry, I think that she is still recuperating from her losses from her previous defeat. It looks like we showed her a lesson or two. What the--" Just as Rash was talking, a mysterious cloked figure appeared out in the ocean and with a wand, it shot a laser like beam into the water, and something weired happen. Out of the water came a...
1552222222222222222111.title: A day on the beach in Malibu, California

choices: Fight the Dark Queen's two minions
15522222222222222221111.content: The cloaked figure reveals herself. The battletoads gang look suprised to see who it is, who happens to be The Dark Queen. "Ahh! She is at it again!!!" The dark queen sneers, "ha ha ha ha! I am back, and have the ultimate plan. I am going to make myself a ray gun that can cause me to change my size or the size of others, and it is almost finished. Once I have it finished, I will make myself to grow to be the size of Godzilla, and with that I will destroy this world, and once that happens, i will rebuild this world into what I call, The Kingdom of the Dark Queen, which will be a kingdom that I rule it all, and you are not goign to stop me! HA Ha HA!" Rash asks, "how do you expect to complete your weapons?" The dark queen giggles and says, "I my weapon is finished, it is a big ray gun, but before it is finished, it needs an energy source, which is magma." She calls Big Blarg and Robo Mantis, "Big Blarg, Robo Mantis! Get over here!" A huge drilling machine comes up by the Queen and a huge rat comes out of the vehicle along with a big robot with a huge machine gun (yes picture the two from the origional game, scary). "Yes my mistris?" The dark queen says, "I am going to use the drilling machine to dig a hole into the earth's mantle and get magma." Then she points at the battletoads gang, and says, "get rid of these pests, and while you are at it, kill off the civilians at the beach, I don't want any witnesses to meddle with my master plan. Got it?" The big rat and the huge robot with a big machine gun says, "yes madam". With that, the Dark Queen gets into the drilling machine and proceeds into the ocean and starts digging towards the mantle, and Big Blarg and Robo Mantis get ready to attack the battle toads as well as the rest of the people on the beach.

The Battle Toads stop the Dark Queen

It was a tough battle, as the toads had to dodge Robo Manis's attacks as well as Big Blarg's, but eventually, the toads gain the upper hand in the battle, and Big Blarg, seeing the dark queen's drilling machine comming out of the water says, "we will deal with you another time. Pimple says, "let's try to stop them before they escape."
