1552222222222222222111111.content:
THe battletoads try to stop the dark queen, but she and her minions manage to get away. Zitz says, "uh oh! The dark queen is at it again, and letting her get away is not good." Rash says, "yeah, I wonder what she plans to do with that size changing ray gun she has?" Pimple heads to his modified car and beckons for the other toads to follow and says, "we must head back to our headquarters. Professor Vulture might be able to help us with this one." With that, they leave the beach, and head towards their headquarters near Las Vegas, Nevada. The place that they have was origionally the site of Area 51, but the government agents decided to sell the land after exausting their research of extraterrestials, and decided to scrap the research facilities, and the battletoads bought the base for them. Pimple pulls a lever in the car and it converts into a helicoper, and he proceeds to fly it to their headquarters in Las Vegas to discuss the situation.

Meanwhile...
1552222222222222222111111.title: The Battletoads head back to their base.

choices: The Battle Toads assess the Dark Queen's plans
15522222222222222221111111.content:
While the toads are preparing to discuss the Dark Queen's re-emergence with the Coach, the Dark Queen returns to her base as well. After several years of exile, in outerspace, she decided to set up a base on the moon, after getting ideas from the movie, Austin Powers: The Spy who Shagged me, though her base was much bigger than the predecesor with the Moon's core being converted into the main reactor of the base. Anyways, after escaping from the toads, with a touch of a button, her drilling machine turns into a space ship, and she flys off to the moon and once there, she gathers her minions with her and gives them a briefing of her evil scheme. "Listen up, my friends. Over the last several years, all of my diabolical schemes have been thwarted by the Battletoads, along with their Coach and other friends. However I have just a plan that just might work." Big Blarg and General Slaughter bring in a big item with a cloth covering into the room. The Dark Queen continues, "I have been reading various GTS stories on the internet along with watching the movie,'Honey! I shrunk the Kids', and though amusing, they have giving me this idea." The minions ask, "what do you plan to do?" The Queen gives out a cackle, "simple, I plan to make myself grow into a giantess and grow all of you guys as well, and with our massive sizes, we will destroy civilization and kill all who oppose us, and in its runes, I will build a new evil kingdom, in which I will rule it all, with an iron fist, that is." There is some laughing in the crowd, and the Dark Queen sneers, "silence, I will show you how I will grow myself." She beckons for General Slaughter to prepare to unveil her weapon that is clothed in the room. "As I told you all, one of the shows that I have been watching is 'Honey, I shrunk the kids', and with the expertise from both General Slaughter and Robo Manis, I built a weapon that is identical to Wayne Lewinksi's size altering machine. General Slaughter, reveal our new weapon." With that, General Slaughter takes off the veil, and a huge laser gun, much like the one from "Honey I shrunk the kids" is displayed. "Ahhh!" the audience says. The Dark Queen says, "this weapon has not been used yet, but I stole someone's cat, which I named, Sylvester while I was retriving magma to fuel my weapon on earth." She goes to the ship and brings out a cute looking cat and puts it in the range of the laser gun. "I will test this machine's capibility to both shrink and grow things that it shoots on this cat (who seems nervous)". General Slaughter had put a small fense within the laser's range so that the cat would not run away before the test is complete and Big Blarg was using the operating mechanisms of the laser, and the Dark Queen continues, "Big Blarg, go ahead and pour magma into the laser's fuel tank and prepare to fire at the cat." Big Blarg says, "aye, madam", and he pours some magma that the dark queen acquired for the size changing laser. The Dark Queen giggles to herself as she gives the command for Big Blarg to fire the laser, "set the machine to 'shrink' with the setting at 3 inches and fire at the cat". With that, Big Blarg sets the size changing laser to "shrink", and fires the laser at the cat. After a short "poof", the cat has shrunk to 3 inches. The evil organization all marvel at the Dark Queen's latest weapon. The Queen continues, "now that the shrinking laser works, we will test the growth laser. Big Blarg, set the laser to 'grow to...10 feet tall', and fire at the cat again." At that, the big rat (Big Blarg) sets the laser to 'grow' with the size setting at 10 feet, and fires at the cat again. As with the first test, the second one was successful and there is a big shreek among some of the queen's smaller minions. The cat was now a huge beast. The cat manages to pounce at one of the onlookers and instinctively devours him, before Big Blarg shrinks the cat back down to normal size. The dark queen muses at the sight. "Excellent, every thing is going as planned. General Slaughter, get me the president of the United States of America, so that I can threaten the world leaders". With that, she prepares to speak to President George Bush.

Meanwhile Back at the Battletoad Headquarters
15522222222222222221111111.title: The Queen's latest scheme

155222222222222222211111111.content: Back at the Battletoads' headquarters near Las Vegas, the battletoads have arrived to the base and met with the Coach, the scientific genius and commander of the battletoads. "Ah! It feels good to be back home, though it is hot out here in the desert." The other toads agree and enter the base. The Coach greets them, "welcome back, how was your trip to the beach in California?" Pimple replies, "it was nice, however the Dark Queen is at it again." The Coach is suprised, "are you sure? Since you guys defeated her when she went after the double dragon team, she seems to have disappeared." Zits replies, "Pimple is right, we saw her with our on eyes, and not only did she send Big Blarg and Robo Manus at us, she was talking about getting magma to fuel some kind of ray gun. Do you know what she might be up to?" Now, the Coach had been interested in the growing/shrinking phenomenon and have seen some of GTS websites while the 'toads were away, and says, "just as I feared, she might be planning to build a laser gun that either shrinks or grows anything that the laser hits. Luckily for us, since the Dark Queen went back into exile, we hired a man by the name, Borris to spy on her, and so we can check with him to see what he has seen." With that, they go to a room with a bunch of video cameras and TV screens that enable the team to communicate with eachother via TV screen. The 'toads and Borris have watches with a built in video camera, small TV screen and a built in microphone and sound system. The Coach says, "let's get him on screen." The screen comes on, and a nerdy Russian with glasses was on screen (much like the person in the movie Goldeneye). He committed espionage during the briefing that the Dark Queen put on and went into a private room in the base when the battletoads used the comlink to reach him. "Yeah, what do you want?" Borris asked. The battletoads reply, "a while back, we sent you to spy on the Dark Queen, and we encountered her while vacationing on one of the beaches in California. Have you noticed anything unusual yet?" Borris replies, "yes, in fact, I spied on her meeting today with her minions and found out that the Dark Queen has built a size changing laser gun that is the replica of the one that was used in the movie, "Honey, I shrunk the kids". It was scary, first, she was elaborating on a plan to make herself along with her cronies grow into giants and wreak havoc on the Earth, and eventually build a new kingdom in which she would rule as the Evil Queen. What should I do?" The coach says, "thanks, try to sabatoge the size-changing laser since you are there." Borris happens to have a remote bomb that can sabatoge weapons, and so he says, "this might be tricky, but I will give it a try." Unfortunatly, little did Borris know, Big Blarg was spying on him from a hidden video camera in the room that Borris was in, and he sent some of the Rat Guards to arrest him, and they started to proceed towards Borris's room. The Coach cuts the transmission, and says to the 'toads, "just as I have feared, the Dark Queen is planning to make herself a giantess along with her cronies, and wreak havoc into the earth's cities so that she can take over the world in its ruins. Luckily I have seen how giants and giantess work in their schemes to destroy things and kill people, and since I have had a feeling that the Dark Queen might try that someday, I have built a bunch of devices and equipment do deal with such a possibility if that were to become real. Come with me to my lab so I can show you our new gadgets and discuss how to stop the evil Dark Queen this time." The 'toads agree, "let's go and stop the Dark Queen once again". And as they start to head out, Borris causes the TV phone to chirp, and they answer it, "come in Coach, Pimple,...". The Pimple answers as rat guards enter the room, accompanied by Big Blarg and Robo Manus, that Borris is in. "What is it?" Borris replies as the guards prepare to arrest him, "I have been caught, don't worry about me, you must stop the Dark Queen. Her headquarters is underground on the Moon, you must stop her before-". Big Blarg interupts, "Ah! Shut up, you spy, Battletoads, I dare you to try an save him, we have set up a sophisticated security system so that not even you can get to him before he is executed, HA HA HA". With that the communication gets severed, and the screen goes blank. The coach gasps, "uh oh! They got Borris. Hang in there, we will try to rescue you." However, they realise that by the time they get to the moon, he would likely have been executed for espionage by the time they get there, so they prepare to come up with a plan to stop her.
155222222222222222211111111.title: A "mole" in the Dark Queen's lair

1552222222222222222111111111.content: President George W Bush had lots of difficult tasks to handle during his presidency including the war on terrorism, high gas prices, the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan, dealing with political pressures, etc, but he is about to deal with an even more difficult task, and evil email villaness with a scheme to take of over the world. The Dark Queen had contacted him and put him on screen. "Mr. President, allow me to introduce myself, I am the Dark Queen, and who are you?" Bush replies, "I am George W Bush, what do you want?" The Dark Queen gives an evil grin, "simple, I want to take over the world." The President laughs, "you and alot of other madmen and mad women an this world, and you know I can't allow you to fulfill the task, for I am for freedom and justice for all." The Dark Queen mocks his statement says, "very well, I will give you an incentive to obey me. You see, I have a new weapon that I want to show you." As she was talking, Big Blarg and some of the guards came into the room with Borris (who was spying on the Dark Queen). "My lady, I am sorry to interrupt, but I found this man in one of the rooms in the base. I have observed that he had been giving information to the battletoads, including your briefing. What should we do about him?" The Dark Queen, gave a wicked grin and says, "perhaps I can use him for a demonstration of my evil schemes. Take the size changing gun and put it in the execution arena." When building her base on the moon, the Dark Queen had built an arena that was to be used for executing spies and enemies that who were unable to stop her. George Bush had been watching and asked, "what do you plan to do with that poor man?" The Dark Queen replies, "I have built a size changing laser gun and I will give you a little demonstration of my weapon of mass destruction as you call it." Bush was puzzled, "you have built a weapon of mass destruction? I will send my military to stop you." The Dark Queen replies, "stop me eh! I will allow you to see the execution arena." With that, she brought her communication device with her to the arena. Bush saw the laser gun and asked, "what do you plan to do with that?" The Dark Queen replies, "you will see. I will bring you back on screen as soon as it is ready." She cuts the transmission temprarily. Big Blarg, bring out the prisoner, Robo Manus (who was also present at the execution), prepare to make me grow to be 64 feet tall." The two cronies reply, "yes ma'am". The Dark Queen says to Borris, "I see that you have been trying to spy on us, and I cannot let you give out any more information about me or what I am planning to do. Do you know what the penalty is for espionage?" Borris asks, "what? Even if you can kill me, I already told the 'toads what you are planning to do." The Queen smiles, "that is exactly what I am planning to do, and you have a special case. Normally, I execute my enemies by a firing squad with my Boss Walker and Robo Manus doing the shooting, but I want to test out this size changing laser on myself." Borris gets nervous, but the Dark Queen is in a hurry to demonstrate her wicked plan. She gets the president back on screen, and says, "Mr. President, allow me to show you the effects of this weapon. Robo Manus, fire the laser!" Robo Manus repies, "yes ma'am" and fires the laser at the Dark Queen, and she grows to 64 feet. The president looks in awe and says, "what do you plan to do with Borris?" The Dark Queen replies, "sentencing him to death for espionage." The president tries to persuade her to reconsider, but she ignores him and with that she picks up Borris and eats him. He struggles a bit, but he passes out from the lack of air, and later on he dies in her stomach (I won't get into details since is a Rated 13 story, but you get the picture). The President gets angry at the Queen, "you sadistic lady, I am going to send people to stop you before you harm anyone else." Robo Manus returns the Dark Queen back to her normal size and she replies, "try to stop me eh! Unless if you and the other world leaders relinquish your powers over to me, I will make myself grow into a giantess, along with some of my cronies and I will destroy one metropolitian area a day with my imense size starting with the large cities first until everything on earth is in ruins, and with you all gone, I will build a new evil kingdom in which I rule it all. For now, me and my men have declared war on you and every single nation unless if you surrender or we obliverate the entire planet! Ha ha ha!". The president is nervous and says, "very well, we have no choice but to declare war on you as well." The dark queen gives out an evil giggle and turns off the screen. Big Blarg asks, "what should we do now?" The Dark Queen gives an evil smile, "our planning has ended, it is time to move to phase 2 of our evil plan. Get Robo Manus, General Slaughter, Boss Walker, and many of my other cronies. We will make ourselves grow and start wreaking havock on Earth." Big Blag replies, "with pleasure." Afterwards, she and most of her army, using the laser gun make themselves grow into 100 feet tall giants and prepare to strike earth. Also little did Borris know, she had built a teleportation system so that she and her army can go places without having to use spaceships or other transportation devices, and she had equipped everyone with watch-like teleportation devices (much like those in the show, Power Rangers) and they prepared to teleport to the first city that we strike. General Slaughter asks, "where should we strike first?" The Dark Queen replies, "perhaps we should give the president a little more time to consider my threat before attacking the US directly. We will attack London first. Prepare to teleport. For the rest of you who have not grown, I too have a spy hidden at the Battletoad headquarters, whose name is Carmen Sandiego and she has given me the location of their base, I am sending the rest of you there to kill them. The 'toads are my biggest obstacle to this scheme, and if you can kill 'em that will make me proud as then there would be no other credible heros to stand in my way, ha ha ha". With that, the Dark Queen and all of those who have grown prepare to teleport to London, and the others prepare to teleport to Las Vegas, Nevada (to attack the battletoads).
1552222222222222222111111111.title: The Dark Queen threatens the world

choices: The battletoads fight Spazz and their minions
They manage to escape and go after the Dark Queen
15522222222222222221111111111.content:
Just as the Dark Queen and some of her cronies begin to invade Europe, back at the base, the Battletoads debate how they will stop the evil Dark Queen. The Coach leads the toads to his labratory that has all of the useful gadgets for battletoad missions. The Coach says to the toads, "we do not have much time before the queen attacks, but before you go out to stop her, I will equip you with equipment that will be necessary to stop her". Pimple asks, "how are we going to deal with an evil giant woman planning to wreak havoc on earth?" The Coach responds, "I have been studying the giantess phenonmenon, and suspected that the Dark Queen may try to do something like that some day, luckily I have created devices that will help you beat the dark queen." He starts presenting equipment. The equipment includes:
1. A vehicle projection device that calls up any of the battletoad vehicles, including jet turbos, jet boards, speed cycles, battle mechs, clinger wingers, tanks, cars, and more, each armed with machine gunes and missiles. The Coach explains, "you will need these to get around and they are armed with weapons to eliminate obstacles and enemies that get in your way".
2. A smaller replica of the Dark Queen's growth changer device, though it is sized more like that of a small calculator, in case if the toads need to grow or shrink.
3. Gastro protection suits, that come as a belt with a button that activates a breatheable suit that protects its users from digestive juices indefinately. The Coach explains, "you will need this incase if the Dark Queen or any of her minions decide to eat you alive. I have seen how giant women will sometimes swallow their victims alive an whole, and let their victims slowly (and often painfully) digest to death, but with this device, should any of you get eaten, you will not die in their digestive systems."
3. Comlinks with small tv screens to communicate with the base and other toads'. They are also equipped with miniture teleportation technology so that they can teleport out of hairy situations if needed.
4. Light Sabers, to give the 'toads an edge in close combat.
5. Bomb defusing devices in case if any bombs are planted
6. Spike balls that are capable of pricking living beings even the size of Elephants, to slow down the Dark Queen and Her minons even as giants.
7. Laser blasters to shot distant targets
8. ropes for climbing and rapeling on various surfaces
9. James Bond style cutting lasers to get out of various situations, including flesh, metal, wire, etc.
10. Miscellaneous items
The toads awe at the Coach's inventions and thank him for the devices that he gave them and they put them in their packs. Now, just as they prepare to go after the Dark Queen, the news comes. "This is ABC news, I am Sara Pratt," the reporter begins. The 'toads and the Coach go to the news room to see what the report is about, "I wonder what this is about?" They ask. The reporter continues, "today, we have reports of a giant woman as well as giant rats, robots, pigs, and rhinos all wreaking havoc in London. I have sent a journalist, Amber Johnson to investigate." The news switches to the scene showing the Dark Queen and her minions going on a rampage in the city, going around destroying buildings, stepping on citizens below, taking Tony Blair hostage, eating Queen Elizabeth as well as other victims and more. A blonde hair lady comes on the scene, "hi, this is Amber and I am witnessing a giant woman and a bunch of other giant creatures going around England and terrorizing civilians. I have never heard of this kind of catastrophe. In addition, I have recieved word that apparently Tony Blair was taken hostage, and the Queen had been eaten by a large rhino creature that has devoured lots of othe civilians." Amber sees the Dark Queen heading towards her beckoning for her to turn off the TV camera. Amber tries to run, but the giant woman steps on her and the video camera and the screen goes blank. The battletoad crew turns off the TV screen before it goes back to Sarah. Pimple says, "it looks like the Dark Queen has already started her invasion, lets prepare to stop her." Just as they prepare to get the jet turbos ready to fly, a gang of large rats, pigs, and several other of the Dark Queen's minions enter the headquarters, lead by a large rat with eyeglasses named, Spazz (who was defeated by the Toads when he tried to blow up the dark queen's ship when she kidnapped Pimple and Angelica back in the day). Spazz says to the 'toads, "going somewhere?" The 'toads look in shock, "how did you know where to find us?" A lady dressed in red with a red hat met up with the 'toads. She says to the 'toads, "just as you had sent a spy to the dark queen's base, the Dark Queen sent me to spy on you as well. I simply gave the Queen your whereabouts, and that is how they came into the base. I will enjoy killing you all." Rash says, "why you traitorous scum, I was supicious of you since you were first here." Spazz cuts off the conversation with a sneer, "as you know, the Dark Queen is off to wreak havoc in the world with the intention of world domination as we speak, a fortune you will not live to see. If you manage to escape from us, you will lose your base, and if you fight us, London falls." The battletoads are faced with a tough decision, save London or save their hides?
15522222222222222221111111111.title: The Battletoads get equipped

choices: The battletoads confront the Dark Queen for the first time
155222222222222222211111111111.content: The battletoads laugh and say, "we have been anxious for a good fight since the battle against Big Blarg and Robomanus, and this time we have a weapon that will give us an edge in this battle. Lightsabers!" They pull out lightsabers and prepare to attack. Spazz laughs, "you call those weapons? They seem to be just toys for Starwars fanatics. Men/Women attack!" The battle begins as Rash slices one of the rats with his saber. Spazz knocks down Zitz, but Zitz retaliates with a super kick. Carmen Sandiego (the lady dressed in red with a red hat) tries to attack Pimple, but he slashes her with his lightsaber and she quickly dies. Soon the battletoads get the upperhand, and Spazz fearing his life decides to escape. "I see that you have all grown strong, since our last encounter" Spazz says as he heads out, "I will be back to settle the score. This battle was merely a distraction for you so that the Dark Queen can begin wreaking havok starting in Europe, and you have lost the first battle. HA HA HA!". With that, Spazz and the rest of his men teleport out of the base. Then the 'toads prepare to head towards london. "Rats, that battle was merely a destraction," Pimple says, "we must go and stop the evil Dark Queen before she wreaks any more havoc. Toads, lets get into the jet turbos and head to England." With that, they prepare to go after the Dark Queen, who has already destroyed London.
155222222222222222211111111111.title: Lightsaber practice

choices: The battletoads defeat the Dark Queen
1552222222222222222111111111111.content: Several hours after the 'toads depart from their base, the Dark Queen decides to have her grown minions split up so that they can create lot more simultaneous destruction. "Good job my friends, we have destroyed London," she say as she looks at the ruins of London. "But, we are far from done. But, I know that the toads will try to stop me, so lets split up. I will head towards the United States, Big Blarg, you take out the rest of West Europe as well as North Africa, Robo Manus, you go after Eastern Europe and parts of Asia, General Slaughter, you go after the Middle East and Africa, and man-eating/headbutting rhinos, go after the people in asia. We will meet up again once the world has been obliberated-." The battletoads arrive to the scene as her minons head out to their assigned targets. "Not so fast, Dark Queen," Pimple says, from an intercom in his jet turbo." The Queen replies sarcastically, "ah, battletoads, we meet again at last." Zitz says, "you're terror ends here, battletoads prepare to stop her." Zitz starts to shoot at her, but she laughs and says, "at my immense size, do you really plan to defeat me at your puny size like that? Take this." With that she slaps Zit's plane and he crashes. She scoops upt Zitz and says, "I you will make a nice meal for me along with the the others." She puts him in her mouth and swallows, and sucks the other 2 jet turbos into her mouth and swallows them as well. But before she could digest them, the toads activate their gastro protection devices and are unaffected by the acids, also Queen Elizabeth is still alive, though unconcious, and so the toads teleport them to the battletoad headquarters. "Wha?" The dark queen asks, "how are you not dying? No matter, I will swallow bricks that will smash you." However, as she prepares to get some bricks from the remaining buildings, the toads teleport out of her body and use the growth device to make themselves grow as well to the size of the Dark Queen. The Dark Queen says, "so you have managed to mimick my technology, your comrad Borris was a good espionage artis, but now I will kill you the old fashion way, by a fist fight." With that, she lashes out at the Toads, and they give her a super punch which knocks her back. Then she morphs into a tornado and knocks them down. But they get up and use a powerful kick on her. The battle rages on between the Battletoads and the dark queen. Who wins the first encounter? You decide.
1552222222222222222111111111111.title: 1st encounter with the Dark Queen

15522222222222222221111111111111.content: After a long while of fighting, the battletoads take out their lightsabres and slashes at her, wounding her, but she does not die. "Ah, just a flesh wound. You win this round, but you have not seen the rest of me." With that, she takes out a teleportation device and teleports out of London. The Battletoads look at each other and say, "that was a close battle, we must go get cleaned up and go after her minions before they destroy this side of the world." With that, they marvel at the destruction that the dark queen causes and after shrinking themselves back to normal size, they check into a hotel that managed to survive the Dark Queen's attack and after cleaning themselves up, they decide who to go after first in stopping the Dark Queen's evil plans. Big Blarg and Robomanus are the closet targets, with Big Blarg targeting Western Europe and Robomanus targeting Eastern Europe and Asia. Who they go after first? You decide
15522222222222222221111111111111.title: The Dark Queen is defeated, but escapes

15522222222222222221111111111112.content: After an emense fight, the Dark Queen ends up victorious with the 'toads knocked down and exhausted. Their lightsabers fall out of their belts. "What's this?" The Dark Queen asks. She continues, "I know what those, they are light sabers, how clever are you guys in mimicking the jedi and sith from Starwars by building light sabers. However, your weapons will be the deaths of you". With that, she steals the light sabers from Pimple and Zitz, and before they could react, she slashes them and the toads quickly die. "Pathetic fools," the Dark Queen says, "with you all gone, there is nothing to stop me from taking over the world". With that, she arms herself with lightsabers and gives her minions replicas, and with those, she slashes buildings, executes hostages and ultimately when combined with her immense size, she prevails in her evil plans.
15522222222222222221111111111112.title: Game over!  The Dark Queen is victorious

155222222222222222211112.content: The battletoads decide to run away from battle, but as they try to do so, Big Blarg, jumps and stomps Zitz, turning him into a toad pancake, and Robo Mantis manages to shoot rash and kills him instantly as well. As for pimple, he realizes that he has no choice but to fight the two monsters. Unfortunately, since he was alone in taking on the 2 henchmen, they inevitably defeat pimple, and he dies as well. Afterwards, while some of the people manage to escape, Big Blarg manages to stomp and pound many of the townsfolks and Robo Manis manages to shoot many of the beach goers. After a while, they complete their mission, and when the Dark Queen returns, she congratulates her henchman, and with her size changing weapon, she grows not only herself, but her minions as well, and they go on a rampage throughout the world. And as you can probably imagine, without the battletoads to save the day, the Dark Queen triumphs, and eventually she sets up her dark kingdom, and a new dark age with darkness and gloom begins. In addition, to avenge her defeat in the previous games, she has the battletoads' headquarter leader, and Pimple's girlfriend, Angelia, and executes them by shrinking them and eating them alive.
155222222222222222211112.title: A cowardly decision, and a very tragic one as well

(So let´s give it a try! I hope this story won´t be too bad.)
And I thought this would turn out to be quite a normal day. I was hanging around in Traverse Town with my friends Aerith and Cloud, talking about lots of things, like the boy with the keyblade. Just then, someone we all hate for his deeds appeared: Ansem!
"He, he, he, hello there, my friends!"
"Ansem, what are you doing here?!"
"I just want to get rid of...you!"
He pointed at me.
"M...Me?!"
"Yes. I have foreseen that you will interfere with my plans, that you will someday help Sora to destroy me. So I´ll have to prevent this."
Now, he spoke some magical words, and I was covered in some light.
"Wh-what´s happening?! Aaarghhh!"
"Sith! Noooo!"
I got one last glimpse at Cloud and Aerith, and then...poof! Disappeared.
A whole lot later (seemed like an eternity), I woke up again. I looked around, and everything seemed so...real. Nothing was comic-like.
"The real world?! This must be the world of our creators!"
And more significant was the fact that I was incredibly small now, and that I was swimming in a white substance, milk, I guess, with some flakes.
"I must be swimming inside...cerials. Gross!"
But that meant that...someone was having breakfast! And I soon saw who: the japanese star Hikaru Utada, creator of a wonderful song for our beautiful gaming world! So that´s how Ansem wanted to get rid of me: getting swallowed by a cute japanese girl! How creative!

info.brief_description: Hi there! I changed the whole thing a bit. Now, mild vore is the main goal!
info.description:
I changed the purpose of my interactive a bit. Now, please focus on mild vore (even if it´s only one chapter, and the next one is a "normal" GTS chapter again).
1. Keep it (rather) serious and interesting! Above all, there must be good reasons for the events (why is the girl growing? Why is the man shrinking?)
2. Most importantly, keep it clean! No sexual content or adult language! The stories have to be serious somehow, so please follow my advice.
3. Although the story is, ahem, serious, that doesn´t mean there can´t be funny events, as long as you keep it interesting.
4. As the title says, mild vore only. No chewing and no digestion.
5. And don´t end the stories with the main character dying!
6. Most important question: which girls? What game should they come from? Well, everything goes, as long as they´re from a CONSOLE game. I propose: girls from Final Fantasy, Dead or Alive, Virtua Fighter, Star Ocean, Ridge Racer and so on. But of course, there are more possibilities.
So, that´s it. These are the rules. If you are a video game and gts fan, then PLEASE add! I´m looking forward to reading your chapters!
Update! Over 11 000 views and 437 chapters. Not bad. Thanks for adding, reading and rating!
